comments: Good looking game ruined by slow combat.   You have 4 team members in the beginning, each with 3 abilities. But only one ability can be used, and everyone has to wait 5-6 second global cool down to be able to use a next skill. Global CD on top of the native cool down is not fun. Each battle becomes just an auto attack for 2 minutes, and takes strategy straight out the window.

Would be nice to be able to actually use skills without having to wait agonizingly long for every single skill to come off cool down, even though you only used 1 Skill.. And then have to wait 2 minutes for that same skill to come off cooldown. Too long and too boring. Fix cooldowns and you might have an interesting game

The game pretty much plays by itself. You enter into a level and it's a one time boss fight and so far that is all there is to it. As far as customization goes you can only equip ruins. I don't think there's an option to change weapon or armor. Lots to read in the tutorial, the lack of voice overs doesn't really bother me. Graphics are good and you can unlock some pretty good main characters, more at level 4. If this was an open world with full customization it would have a been an amazing game. Overall, it's not the worst game on the market!

No reward for pre-register player? Already have 2 master, but disapoint coz cant play 2 master together.. Bad gacha system, need summons stone but still need gold to summon, chance to get hero *4+ very low..

Firstly, the game is beautiful. Secondly,  a way to improve on this game is to let users switch off full auto,  meaning turn based mode,  just like Summoners War.  Thirdly,  prices are way too high on everything.  Fourthly,  game launches with little to no reward. A welcome gift of sorts would be appreciated.  Fifthly,  Some hero voice overs would be nice.  All in all,  a beautiful game marred by the usual greediness of their makers.

This game is a disappointment, coming from all the hype it garnered. Graphics is good but gameplay has no originality and needs no input from the player. If you're into this game and wants more player input (like positioning of healers/tank and DPS during fights) try Velator. Same quality with actual need of player input.. I'm in Velator. Guild Elitists.

descriptionHTML:
A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

comments: Only problem I have is an overabundance of chests that you get stuck with and can't possibly open them all on time and it makes you lose out on getting gold chests or Diamond chests. It would be really nice if you can choose to dump any of the chests you don't want. Or swap out the ones you have in stock for the newly acquired better ones after a ranked match. Other than that, awesome game

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

Fun game. But you definitely have things to fix. Like the fact that sometimes when you win, you still lose. And I'm not talking about having less gems. I'm talking  when the other player doesn't even in the hole. Definitely a glitch. Also, as far as controls....easy enough. But sometimes while I'm in the middle of a backswing, the ball will shoot on it's own without me releasing it. Which sucks because it's a wasted shot and usually costs you the match. Aside from those two irritating problems, it really is a fun game. I will continue to play, hoping you fix the issues.

Game cheats, puts you against lower lol players with better equipment who make ungodly shots, or much higher level where you don't have a chance. I hit things that aren't there, and with a crossword my ball will fly into the wind with no action. Opponent Always get better wind and direction, and will outshoot you work lower equipmeny.
The game doesnt allow you to get a proper pull back on your swing. To much clutter on some stages. Plus those who play too win always beat those who dont

comments: I like it very much. It doesn't have bugs or anything. It runs smoothly and has fun daily puzzles. The only thing it took me a while to realize was that I was timed in Blitz, but it's better now and I understand. There isn't a thing I want you to change. Keep up the good work. üëç

comments: It is amazing.really keeps you hooked on.. However when it comes to completing the quest, resources get over quickly and as per the time we need to wait for 3hrs for getting the refill,or buy it with the diamonds.... Lower the time limit for resource production like in different expeditions..as that will unable us to play more and complete it too on time.

Such a great and fun game but you can't do anything without buying food, money and diamonds with real money. No videos or exchange options. Would have played a lot longer if these options were available instead op purchasing with real money. Such a shame.

I thought it would be more about solving things, but there are no brain challenges for now and I'm on the 10th level. I've noticed that a few times some of my coins disappeared. Slow as you need to grow a lot of food etc. before you can do anything. You would have to spend quite a lot of real money to make it reasonable pace

The pop-up ads trying to get you to spend money on the game that happen every time you open the game are annoying.  Also annoying that there are so many new missions that you can never finish one before a new one starts and if you do the missions you never have time to work on your own island.  This game is nothing like the pictures suggest for this app.  I thought there would be adventure and puzzles.  It's a glorified Farmville without the interaction of other neighboring farms (or islands in this case).  Still, it's addicting and frustrating that I can never clear those little missions that line up on the side of the screen.  There isn't enough time in life to finish them.

I like the game, it helps pass time. My only complaint is you make it super hard to do anything without having tonso3ns real money. Which is ridiculous. I get that you need to make money off of this, but don't be so ridiculous about it.

Really enjoy the game. Not spent a penny on it yet and managing alright to do tasks etc in a reasonable time. Though I've not completed a quest yet but that could be me not getting back to the game regularly enough. That's my issue though.

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

comments: I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game
Game is very addicting but after a little while of playing you can't hit jump or land! Maybe just me? Also, I don't want to pay for upgrades. Should be merit based on how well you race.

Disappointing...the game would easily be 5 stars, as it is very fun, but once you reach a certain point, it becomes pay to play as you need gold to upgrade your bike to stay competitive with the CPU rider.  Can't even play anymore because it's impossible to progress any further.

comments: It's a good twist on the base building genre. Whether or not it'll keep me interested long term I don't know. We'll see if, at later stages, it can become like the others where you have to spend money or fail. For now it's very entertaining.

Sooo amazing! I've only been playing for 2 days and I'm on lvl 10 üòÇ I guess it'll be nice if there will be more Clan activities wherein all members can participate to avoid being bored while wiating for upgradea.  All in all,  I love this!

It's get stuck on the  first beginning  of game when I level up my mansion   to level 8 can all fix it thanks so much please I want to play the game but it is not working  at all can some one  please answering to  my request  please thanks so much
Great time killer. The packs are expensive for the bs you get. I spent over $2000 on GOW due to the decent packs, but theres no way I'd buy any mafia city packs.
Micro transactions are distroying games in every degree. Hey production and promoting team, hang yourself. This game is garbage

Excellent game, very good graphics. I only started this to get tokens for another game. Wow, I can't stay off it. I now have my own crew and we are building. My advice? TRY THE GAME!!! you'll love it. I used to play iMobs on Storm8 but they shut the game down. This is better by a long chalk.

descriptionHTML:
★ ★Genuine underworld strategy mobile game, play with millions of players worldwide★ ★
☆Worldwide connection, no color, language or nationality differences and together compete to become the Godfather. 
☆Clan, plunder, occupy and upheavals between gangs, intrigues, and compete for the honored seat of King of Mafias.

★ ★Game features★ ★ 
☆☆3D HD Unity game engine, ultimate gaming screen 
Zooming feature, 360-degrees multi-angle with well-graphic picture, providing a near real virtual reality.
☆☆Live strategy Rallying
Come! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work. 
Establish your Clan's forces and wake those potential talents. 
If you don’t crush them here, tomorrow they'll crush you.

☆☆One and only worldwide server, along with professional translation system capable of translating all language to one
✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty. 
✔Rule with brothers everywhere; Situate in the Coast, set aim for the vast East and into the world, unify the gang.

✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. 
✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! 
✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.

comments: This is easily one of the top 5  free game apps I've ever played. Yes, it gives you the option of buying gameplay, but it has more than enough gameplay for free. I can't tell you how many apps I've installed, then uninstalled the same day because of how boring they were or how the only way to actually accomplish anything you have to pay. This game is flat out awesome!

3 stars and I'll explain myself.   1. The game is very addicting and fun, the looks are nice and must I say I love how the northern lights strain look when it's fully grown.   BUT   2. There aren't many strains, would be cool if you could create alot more strain by mixing or idk discovering by accident. Those would add to the game. The game feels like there isn't much to do once you get so far at a given point
Will have to stop playing, massive battery and overheating issues. CPU load is too high. It's just lagging my phone. Shame quite enjoy the game play.

I love this game. Only complaint is that with the latest update I can't rotate my screen the opposite direction. Definitely not a deal breaker, just extremely annoying when I want to charge my phone while paying. Definitely something you guys should look at.

Awesome and fun to play, if you managr your resources well then it doesnt take forever to level up and you dont have to pay to get anywhere. Awesome free stuff sometimes to help you out when you're down, and the story just continues and never loses its spark. Very fun and many things to do other than just grow weed and sell it.
it's a very addicting game that I would recommend to my kids.  Cause it shows them the ethics of real life.  And honestly who doesn't give weed to babies these days...?
description: Let's get growing! Enter the world of Hempire.  Follow the story of Uncle Danny from small-time grower to marijuana mogul.  Make partnerships, upgrade buildings and grow ops, customize your city and become the biggest player in the weed world.Features:* Grow and customize popular cannabis indica, sativa and hybrid strains.* Use the lab to breed and discover new strains and remain at the top of the industry.* Craft extracts like hash and shatter, and edibles like cookies and brownies.* Upgrade your grow op with new equipment, lights, and generators as your business grows.* Complete deals with game characters to unlock new features and strains.* Decorate your businesses with trees, items and vehicles from a dune buggy to race car.* Generate huge cash by selling your custom product in the dispensary.* Invest your money in local businesses and real estate and develop your city.* Start with one bud and grow your company into a billion dollar enterprise.* Multiplayer Competition. descriptionHTML:
Let's get growing! Enter the world of Hempire. Follow the story of Uncle Danny from small-time grower to marijuana mogul. Make partnerships, upgrade buildings and grow ops, customize your city and become the biggest player in the weed world.

Features:
* Grow and customize popular cannabis indica, sativa and hybrid strains.
* Use the lab to breed and discover new strains and remain at the top of the industry.
* Craft extracts like hash and shatter, and edibles like cookies and brownies.
* Upgrade your grow op with new equipment, lights, and generators as your business grows.
* Complete deals with game characters to unlock new features and strains.
* Decorate your businesses with trees, items and vehicles from a dune buggy to race car.
* Generate huge cash by selling your custom product in the dispensary.
* Invest your money in local businesses and real estate and develop your city.
* Start with one bud and grow your company into a billion dollar enterprise.
* Multiplayer Competition. The Hempire Cup: Compete against other players to breed the highest quality strain winning trophies in the Hempire Cup.

Grow your Hempire. Your pot-ential is limitless.

Join us online:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hempiregame
* Instagram: hempiregame
* Twitter: @HempireGame
* Website: http://hempiregame.com

Please note Hempire is a free-to-play experience, but some game items are available for purchase using real money. A network connection is also required.

comments: I love the game!! Thank you so much! It's just what I wanted to relax! so far I play it every day! The 80s neon style is great! I can't wait to see how the game grows! The graphics are well done too! I personally would like to see more trippy lights and colours  reacting to the velocity and frequencies of the songs and  perhaps a bit more speed! Maybe a bit more anti-gravity with some corkscrews and loop de loops, jumps..y'know that sort of thing!Keep it up guys, looking forward to seeing what happens next :D
I would've liked to play it but it says it only supports mp3

What an amazing update! I've followed this game since the first time it's launch, and it's getting better and better. Would be much more impressive if you can add Quick Play mode (random race on random music) and an option for premium mode which you can remove the ads (I know you have to earn something from your hard work, but can you consider this? Cuz I'd definitely buy the premium option). Please consider those two and thanks a lot for your amazing work.

[ new review ] The update which was released yesterday has improve the game by quite alot. Still, it'd be awesome to see more improvement to see more improvement on this game [ old review ] This is one of the best game with high quality graphic. Everything in this game is smooth. However. There's too manything thats going on in the screen. It hard to know what to dodge and what to collect. There's no time to react to stuff. Still the graphic can hide it away. But it has turn the game into an uneasy situation.

I love it! I was looking for a game like this a few weeks back, but gave up. Along comes this, with a FANTASTIC 80s vibe! That's just my speed! My only suggestion is that there should be lanes, because I can't quite tell where the points are until they're right in front of me. It makes it hard to plan moves. However, it certainly isn't anything to get you less than five stars. Bravo! P.s: for any Duran Duran fans out there, "the reflex" works BEAUTIFULLY.

I think this game is marvelous but I do think there should be more to it like multiplayer maybe? I also found that I played the retro map more than the first one cause it just made me feel sick and I couldnt see the light cubes properly and it just felt abit too hectic. I also think that the levels should flow better if u get what I mean like flow better with the song. Don't get me wrong though this is a great game but this is just a little bit of constructive criticism

comments: After playing now for a while, I really like the game, but cost way too much to be able to really play and advance, only given 4 free rolls an hour, cannot do anything with that, rolls should be free. I have spent a lot of money buying gems so I could buy rolls in order to really play the game. I think it is unfair to your customers. Should be set up better for people to be able to enjoy the game without costing a small fortune.

I like this game a lot and its fun but  it's a little more on the pay to win side,  the amount of time you have to wait for rolls is so annoying especially during events. I understand why some apps need to be pay to win but I just think it needs to be toned down a bit.  Another issue I have noticed is that 80% of the time ads freeze in the middle of playing so I end up having to close the game and try again.  Other than that it's very fun to play in my spare time and the graphics are very cute and vibrant.

I'm having 2 problems with the game. 1: whenever my bunnies have rolls to give me, and I tap to get them, I don't actually receive them. They vanish. 2: When im visiting someone else's board, the game crashes and I lose everything I got into that board such as money, conquered buildings and gems.  It's driving me crazy. Also, I would like for the rolls to recharge every 30 minutes, 1 hour is too much time. I love this game, so addictive.

Update: Most bugs are fixed, my previous issue had been fixed and I'm very thankful for that. I have so much fun playing this game with my friends and have no problem spending money on in game purchases. The only issue right now is that I'm getting kicked out of the game due to connection issues.

I bought a deal in the shop and got extra coins as a prize since my coins spiked to around 1million. Never got a notice saying i got these coins i just happened to notice and was like what the heck, is this a glitch? Then realized it was probably the prize i could get with purchase. 800k was then stolen before i had a chance to use them. We are talking the window of 20sec or less without ever logging off. So I spent actual money on this game and didn't get to use the stuff i spent money on. Poor design that you can have something you paid for stolen within seconds of the purchase.
Hate the new update. It's really annoying when your friends can now steal your money when you are playing. When will I be able to collect enough money to upgrade my building? It cost 800k.

descriptionHTML:
Hello and welcome to Board Kings!
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!
Join your friends and family in the new and exciting free online multiplayer board game!

Meet your board! Choose your idol and throw the dice!
Build the greatest city for your bunnies!

Throw the dice and earn coins as you go!
The dice will determine where you go! You decide what to do with your coins!
If you’re lucky you’ll land on the bonus tiles and win awesome rewards and boosts!
But remember, it’s not all about luck, it’s about strategy and skill.

Build up your city!
Use the coins to build and develop your city! Climb up the leaderboard by expanding your bunny population. The more you build, the more bunnies you will have!
Build the most amazing thriving city of all time!
The more you build, the bigger the board will become!

Protect Your Board!
To protect your city from strangers and other unwelcomed mischiefs you need to land on the police station! Upgrade the police station to deploy more police cars!

Steal From Your Friends
Win your friends’ coins by landing on the Steal tile! Didn’t find the richest city? No worries! You’ll win other people’s coins as well!

Win Bonus Features!
Land on the bonus tile and win special features for your board! Extra coins! Extra police cars! It’s always a win to have more than your friends!

Visit your Friends’ Boards!
Hop on the train and choose the friend you miss the most! You can also pay a visit to others who were at your board.
While visiting your friends’ city you can throw the dice and:
*** Own your friends’ buildings! ***
*** Destroy others’ cities! ***

*** Steal coins by breaking others’ piggy banks! ***
Watch out for the police! Or you might get thrown in jail! To be freed you’ll need to throw a double or pay the fine!

Become the Board King, now! It’s free-to-play, but you can also purchase additional items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
Any Suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any problems? We love our players! You can reach out to our support team from inside the game!
Your board awaits!

summary: Join your friends in the most exciting competitive board game!
title: Board Kings

comments: The problem with this game is simple.  It's inconsistent.  It lags at random times, and the hold function is randomized. Sometimes it's a fifth of a second for a full jump, sometimes it's a half second.  The game lags and stutters enough to make any real progress completely impossible for all but the most determined people with too much time on their hands.  1 point for hurting Trump -1 point for crappy design  Making this a solid 0 rating game.

comments: Im very annoyed at the fact that i made an in game purchase, only to find that the following day my account had bee reset and i lost all of my upgrades...   Im pretty sure i had already rated this too... no reply and now im rating again... hmmm.  Please sort this out for me!   At this rate im going to be looking for a refund rather than the in game benefits!!!  Update!  I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game... and still nothing...  Id like a refund please.   I wont be playing anymore.

Absolutely amazing, love the style, gameplay, and the story concept is very interesting and fresh. The one scenario a day also helps with not beating it in a single day and keeps bringing you back! The only problem I can really find is the game seems kind of easy at times and I haven't really felt the need to upgrade my health or buy new weapons but other than that it's a very fun game!
Editing now after the bug fixes.  Saving works now.  Still like the art style and sound of the game.  Challenge seems to have dropped a little but we'll see what later levels provides.

Hello, I tried replying to a reply from the developers on a review I left so I just thought Id leave another review instead. I tried reinstalling, like you asked me to (clearing the cache also) and I still didn't have any of my purchases redeemed as the adverts were still playing. Is there any other ways of fixing this?? Is there anything you can do on your end?? Please. Good news is though, Im not having to redo the tutorial everytime I log in now :)
Ive edited my review because the issue I was having is fixed now.  Its a nice game. I like the graphics, the story I can see is fine, and it does save progress now so I can finally see more of it.

The game is cool that's for sure. But one level a day, kinda weak. Wouldn't you want to get people hooked on the game? Sell some ad space and give insentives to progress in the game? That would seem smart, if you want people playing your game and checking out the cool graphics. I don't see staying interested in this game more than a few days. It'll probably sit untouched for a month, until I finally clear out all the other unused apps on my phone.   Cheers.  *edit*  So shortly after my first review, I got my reward for the ONLY level of the day. One feather. Really? Just one? Not enough for any upgrade? Literally NO reason to keep me coming back, or anybody? Come on guys. This is your first time trying to make money from an app, right? Whoever is calling the shots is doing a poor job lol. I'll be deleting the game now lol not even worth a few days.   Sorry for being so blunt.  Cheers again.

descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/

comments: It so calm and exciting to play this game when you have nothing to do and can get best your brain for think for tests and other work at school if you are. The levels continues when I am done and it give me some harder crossword when I leveled up. Love your game and keep up the good work in this game. The game is kinda loading slow when I opened the app. Can you fix that?

I really enjoyed this game until about level 250. After that some of the words aren't real words. And words that counted before no longer count. I'm also disappointed that when you earn extra rewards, such as 50% off of hints for a set amount of time, you have to immediately go use that instead of waiting until you start playing the game again at a later time. I'd also like some explanation as to what the flowers are for and what the spirit animal rocks are all about. Overall it's a fun game to take up a few minutes here and there.

I really love and enjoy this crossword game it did deep into your mind on allot of the puzzles and gets you to remember words that you didn't realize you ever knew them, and you see words you didn't even know at all. Only one thing I found is some of the word had me questioning is that really even a word? Love it I would defiantly tell my friends and family about the game. Thanks for simulating my brain again lol

The game is beautiful and the play interface is good too. BUT I CANNOT GET OVER HOW MY WORDS DONT COUNT. THERE ARE AT LEAST 1 OR 2 OBVIOUS WORDS PER LEVEL THAT DONT COUNT AS BONUS WORDS. It is driving me nuts. Won't play again. Why aren't those words in the puzzle in the first place?

When will there be more levels? I made it to the last level and love playing it so I would love to know when more levels will be available. Also, not a huge fan of how some words count in some levels and not in others and how some of the words are not actually words. I looked up definitions for some words and they do not exist in any dictionary. Please correct these issues.

American spelling of English words which is a drawback. Also annoying is the fact some plural words of the singular words not accepted despite the singular being recognised. Also vice versa too. Some words not accepted despite perhaps being used and accepted on a previous level. So over all a lot of work needs to be done to sort it out.

descriptionHTML:
Connect letters in a level and finish a word. So entertaining and totally for free!
You have surely played many word games and been invincible.
Now there is a completely new word link game waiting for you to take the challenge! Want to prove your skills?

Word Crossy combines word search and crossword style games. By Connecting letters, you get a complete word and fill it into a crossword blank. This is only the first step! If you want to win, you still need to find all the words hidden in the crossword. Challenge yourself and train your brain.

Feature:
- Easy to play and amusing, Connecting words to build a complete word.
- More than 300 levels and multiple words to search for.
- Crossword style to make the game experience even more interesting.
- The degree of difficulty increasing according to player’s progress.
- No time limits.
- Letters redraw and useful hints when needed.
- Beautiful visual experience.

How do I play?
- Connect the letters on the wheel to get a correct word.
- Find all the words and fill in the crossword blanks.

Play Word Crossy to train your brain, let your free time be more fun!

NOTES
• "Word Crossy" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like coins.
recentChanges: We hope you‚Äôre having fun playing Word Crossy! We update the game every week so don't forget to download the latest version to get all the  new features and levels!
Thanks for your feedback and keep it coming!
summary: A funny crossword game. Connect letters in a level and finish a word.
title: Word Crossy - A crossword game

comments: This was my favorite game as a kid. Of course I played it on NAMCO museum for PlayStation. The controls were perfect and the entire family loved to compete. This version looks the same graphics wise, but these are the worst controls possible! Too small space and the fire button and move buttons aren't very responsive. I looked for this game before and it wasn't in the store now it is. Want to rate 5 stars but please fix the controls first. Too hard to play and enjoy at the moment.

Will change to 5 stars after 2 things are fixed. The controls need to go from a Dpad to a joytick style. And only one fire button is needed. Other than that this is amazing and perfect I will even buy it or donate if these problem are fixed. Also just a little line to show the center of the screen since the score board is on the side. Many classic galaga players rely on knowing where the center of the screen is for bonus stages

I was so happy to find this, but the controls are horrible. I've got the galaxy 8splus and the controls are as big as the screen. Very hard to play. Fingers are tripping all over themselves bc of trying to fire and moving left/ right.  I give you huge props for it being exact, please fix so more of us old people can play! Never appreciated a joy stick so much. üòâ

Its the actual Galaga but the controls are horrendous. Please fix asap.  I don't know why they stuck with a d-pad and A and B buttons.  Modernize the controls.  Tapping anywhere on the screen should allow you to shoot.  Sliding your finger left and right should allow you to move.  They should allow for 2 different control options classic and modern.

If the controls were better, this would be 5 stars. This really reminds me of my childhood. I was around 12 years old when this came out. Great retro game that is authentic and gun, except for the controls, they don't respond all the time and the placement is bad.

You should be able to change the on screen controls to your liking, the on screen d-pad has and up and down button that does nothing and it just takes up room on the screen. But this is the closest to the real thing on the whole Play Store and it's still fun.
description: The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.

A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.

Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.

*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
summary: Controls a starfighter to destroy insect-like enemies
title: Galaga

description: Welcome to the world of Merge Kingdom!, where everything can be merged, and your only object is to heal the land. You‚Äôre the ruler of a vast kingdom, whose land has been struck by a terrible plague. In order to save your kingdom, you need to save the land - the only means of doing that, is by merging objects. All of the trees in the game can be merged. The more you merge, the stronger the objects become. The stronger the objects, the better they will be able to heal the land. As you merge and heal, you will unlock more and more land, growing your Kingdom.Think you can merge to save your kingdom? Try Merge Kingdom! today!

comments: Just finished the game this evening. Overall impression is wonderful. The game play is smooth, and addictive. The controls are just fine. The story line is wonderful; it's very catchy and addicting too. The "Pokemon" aspect that many people seek in games is in this one. You do have the ability catch any monster you encounter, and you do use them to fight your battles. The battle system is set up very well, and it's balanced. The customer service is good, too. I had an issue where I deleted a save file and my diamonds didn't transfer over. The game developer reimbursed me with a smile. I strongly recommend this game to anyone looking for a good turn based rpg game on mobile.

Fantastic game,  amazing art and music,  great animation,  story line is interesting,  only thing I don't like is that the in game screen is too zoomed in and it won't let me progress pass the tutorial of diamond shop.  Once you enter the shop,  you can't exit the shop...  Also the title screen is also zoomed in please fix and ratings will go up.

This game is definitely one of the best pokemon-like games on the app store! The art is great and I was loving it so far, but unfortunately the layout on my phone is the biggest issue. I have a galaxy note8 and things are getting cut off, and sometimes when I click my bag or dex it straight up disappears from the screen when I exit from it. If these minor bugs could be fixed I'd definitely give it a full 5‚òÜ rating!!!

I started to like the game. Graphics are amazing. However, be careful clearing cache etc. You will have to re purchase the full game if you do! I'm unhappy about this. I paid for it TWICE now. Will give 5 stars if refunded at least for one of the purchases!

Awesome game when I first learn about this game on IOS. I was hoping for an android port ever since and it didn't disappoint at all. I'm just hesitant on spending money because of the lack of cloudsave. I hope you will be able to add it in future iterations of the game. Kodus to you guys
Great game and addicting. The only problem is the screen doesnt fit my Note 8. Text and action boxes are cut off during game play as well as bag disappears off the screen. Please fix this.

description: Trito‚Äôs match 3 Adventure is a new match 3 puzzle tile matching game for the entire family!Make a journey to legendary Greece where Gods and Heroes reign! And help Trito, son of Poseidon, to save his family and the entire underwater kingdom from the intrigues of sly Sea Witch. Wicked sorceress has charmed the Sea God, broke his trident and scattered its fragments across the ocean!Only Trito can bring peace, harmony and reign back to the ocean depths. Move, combine and match three or more tiles of the same kind in order to complete a level in order to gain more magical energy to complete numerous tasks.Homescapes:Clean up and renovate the houses of various underwater creaturesGardenscapes:Decorate and rid the sea floor garden of pesky sea crittersSeascapes:Bring live and reign into the ocean depth once again as it used to be before the arrival of the sea witch!Immerse yourself in a vibrant ocean world with Trito and his best friend little octopus Octy. Help unique underwater creatures, restore magnificent sea gardens and bring fabled underwater cities back to glory and under the reign of Poseidon! Huge whales, wise turtles, elusive seahorses are amazing parts of Trito‚Äôs Match 3 Adventure!Features:- Extraordinary combination of fascinating storyline and challenging match-3 puzzle;- Plenty of majestic underwater cities to explore on different planets;- Funny and memorable characters of sea creatures;- Hundreds of unique challenging match-3 tile matching levels;- Newest cartoon graphics and incredible animation;- Marvelous animated charismatic boosters.Use magical blasts of fairy fish-boosters to clear difficult levels. Dancing crabs, jet-powered sea horses, explosive fugu fish and spooky seadevil anglerfish are there to help you complete fishy tile puzzle!Grow seaweed and coral gardens, create exclusive fish, collect jewels, use magic gems, fight pure ancient evil and stop volcanic eruptions in our new tile matching match-3 puzzle game!Be sure to complete the various tasks involved in landscapes, homescapes, gardenscapes and seascapes!*** Don't Forget to Complete 2 Mini Events For Rewards ***--- Whale Kid Treasure --- Help the Whale Kid to find the treasure by completing 3 levels of match-3 puzzles. Earn awesome rewards such as gems, boosters and temporary unlimited energy. But beware, lose a level and you have to start over. --- King Shell ---Complete match 3 story levels and earn progressive rewards through King Shells.*** Complete these mini events to earn the resources to help you on your tasks involving Homescapes, Gardenscapes and Seascapes ***Kindly note, that Trito‚Äôs Adventure is a free match 3 puzzle game. However, additional features may be unlocked through payments.Compete with your Facebook friends and help them by sending extra lives.Like our game? Learn more about our game here:Facebook: facebook.com/Seascapes.TritosAdventureInstagram: instagram.com/tritosadventureTwitter: twitter.com/LittleTritoDo you have any questions? Contact our customer support at support@playplayfun.com
descriptionHTML:
Trito’s match 3 Adventure is a new match 3 puzzle tile matching game for the entire family!

Make a journey to legendary Greece where Gods and Heroes reign! And help Trito, son of Poseidon, to save his family and the entire underwater kingdom from the intrigues of sly Sea Witch. Wicked sorceress has charmed the Sea God, broke his trident and scattered its fragments across the ocean!

Only Trito can bring peace, harmony and reign back to the ocean depths. Move, combine and match three or more tiles of the same kind in order to complete a level in order to gain more magical energy to complete numerous tasks.

Homescapes:
Clean up and renovate the houses of various underwater creatures

Gardenscapes:
Decorate and rid the sea floor garden of pesky sea critters

Seascapes:
Bring live and reign into the ocean depth once again as it used to be before the arrival of the sea witch!

Immerse yourself in a vibrant ocean world with Trito and his best friend little octopus Octy. Help unique underwater creatures, restore magnificent sea gardens and bring fabled underwater cities back to glory and under the reign of Poseidon! Huge whales, wise turtles, elusive seahorses are amazing parts of Trito’s Match 3 Adventure!

Features:
- Extraordinary combination of fascinating storyline and challenging match-3 puzzle;
- Plenty of majestic underwater cities to explore on different planets;
- Funny and memorable characters of sea creatures;
- Hundreds of unique challenging match-3 tile matching levels;
- Newest cartoon graphics and incredible animation;
- Marvelous animated charismatic boosters.

Use magical blasts of fairy fish-boosters to clear difficult levels. Dancing crabs, jet-powered sea horses, explosive fugu fish and spooky seadevil anglerfish are there to help you complete fishy tile puzzle!

Grow seaweed and coral gardens, create exclusive fish, collect jewels, use magic gems, fight pure ancient evil and stop volcanic eruptions in our new tile matching match-3 puzzle game!

Be sure to complete the various tasks involved in landscapes, homescapes, gardenscapes and seascapes!

*** Don't Forget to Complete 2 Mini Events For Rewards ***

--- Whale Kid Treasure ---
Help the Whale Kid to find the treasure by completing 3 levels of match-3 puzzles. Earn awesome rewards such as gems, boosters and temporary unlimited energy. But beware, lose a level and you have to start over.

--- King Shell ---
Complete match 3 story levels and earn progressive rewards through King Shells.

*** Complete these mini events to earn the resources to help you on your tasks involving Homescapes, Gardenscapes and Seascapes ***

Kindly note, that Trito’s Adventure is a free match 3 puzzle game. However, additional features may be unlocked through payments.

Compete with your Facebook friends and help them by sending extra lives.

Like our game? Learn more about our game here:

Facebook: facebook.com/Seascapes.TritosAdventure
Instagram: instagram.com/tritosadventure
Twitter: twitter.com/LittleTrito

Do you have any questions? Contact our customer support at support@playplayfun.com
recentChanges: - Optimization. A considerable increase in game performance on less efficient devices
summary: Help little Trito to save the ocean in the beautiful sea match-3 puzzle quest
title: Seascapes : Trito's Match 3 Adventure

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!
descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time.
Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!


Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car.
2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket.
3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.
6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.

***Game features:***
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Daily bonuses.
- First-person mode.
- Richly detailed car models.
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.
- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways.
- Interesting map of the city and its environs.
- Interactive gas station.
- Fun arcade-style missions.
- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims...
- Car showroom.
- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.

Additional bonus!
The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely,
and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!!

description: Manage your own smart car wash & gas station to provide car services including washing, paint job and designing. Play Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station and drive luxury car to refill fuel at the highway service station. Get behind the wheel of muscle cars and drive towards the city service station in car wash games 2018. Put pedal to the metal, park smart car inside automatic car wash games for cleanup and do exciting car customization. For complete engine repair & highway service like oil change, maintenance park inside the auto repair shop. Drive smart car around metro city and park at the highway gas station games to refill the petrol in car washing games.  Luxury cars are arriving in the highway service station for cleanup and car customization, so you as car mechanic have a tough job to do. Get behind the wheel to drive and park super muscle cars at the gas station parking. The luxury cars are directly coming from dirt racing tracks and some of them were involved in police car chase. Entertain yourself and take the smart car in repair garage for inspection and complete engine service in car washing games. Check smart car engine, bumper, alloy wheels and rims to ensure it's clean. Exterior rollover smart car wash is automated system where you drive your luxury car inside the bay. Once your police car is in the correct position, a signal informs you to stop. At that point, the muscle car wash equipment moves over your smart car on a track, performing a specific function, such as applying soap and rinsing like other car customization games.After cleanup at the car wash games you will be able to design and customize highway service car the way customers desire. For designing you will be using various vinyl stickers to give incredible look to muscle cars just like in car mechanic simulator 18. Drive luxury car inside the paint shop to change the color and remove stains, rust and scratches. Operate your gas station and complete smart car parking & driving tasks in car customization games. The car wash station is fully automatic all you need to do is park the luxury car inside car wash and repair games. Simulate your world and tuneup police car engine inside the repair shop garage. The repair shop garage is located next to the paint shop at highway gas station games. This repair shop garage is equipped with all the latest car mechanic simulator tools. This is perfect blend of top rated games like police car parking and smart car wash games.Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking Game Features:Challenging time based luxury car washing, refuel and paint job levelsMultiple muscle car customization: suv, sedan, prado, corvette, limo Realistic highway service gas station environment to drive onUltra realistic police car physics with real v8 engine soundsSmooth vehicle controls for immersive gameplayDownload Smart Car Wash Service: Gas Station Car Parking games now for FREE & entertain yourself!

description: 1872, with a steampunk twist. Phileas Fogg has wagered he can circumnavigate the world in just eighty days. * TIME's #1 Game of the Year 2014* "We‚Äôve been dreaming about this future for decades. Guess what? It‚Äôs here." - New York Times* "Interactive storytelling as its best" - The GuardianChoose your own route around a 3D globe, travelling by airship, submarine, mechanical camel, steam-train and more, racing other players and a clock that never stops. Featuring a brand new journey - to the North Pole!* "This brilliant interactive novel re-imagines Phileas Fogg's journey around the world... One of the finest examples of branching narrative yet created." - The Telegraph* "For people who love high adventures and good writing, 80 Days is a voyage that must be taken" - The Verge* "A brilliantly paced, memorable and quite frankly terrific piece of modern interactive fiction, that masterfully blends strategy, resource management and adventure" - IndieGames.com150 cities to explore. Detailed research and techno-fantasy combine in an 1872 of tensions, inventions and exploration. Climb the Burmese mountains, trek the Zulu Federation, sail up the Amazon and disappear under the Indian Ocean - but don't fall behind the time! * "This is modern storytelling that engages and delights, and the bold, stylish artwork gives 80 Days almost a graphic novel feel. Pack your case, armchair Passepartout - adventure awaits!" - Joystiq* "Is it a game? Is it a story? Both, really. And a delight." - The Telegraph - Best Novels of 2014* "Could be the best interactive fiction game out there" - 148 Apps* "A sublime video game to immerse yourself in" - The Examiner* "One of the most extraordinarily memorable and unique games I‚Äôve played in years" - Pocket Tactics * "Everything about this game is perfect" - AppAdvice* "Innovative and extraordinary, and unpredictable fun" - Apps Zoom* "Rich with ideas, brilliantly written, and creates a world that you'll want to visit over and over again" - PocketGamer (gold award)Featuring stunning art by Jaume Illustration, a half-million word script by Meg Jayanth, original music by Laurence Chapman, and built using the same inklewriter engine that powers our critically-acclaimed Sorcery! series, 80 DAYS is an interactive adventure created by your choices, on the fly, and is different every time you play.Playing as Phileas Fogg's loyal valet, Passepartout, you must balance your master's health, your finances, and the time, as you choose your own path from city to city all the way around the world. Bribe your way onto early departures, but don't let yourself go bankrupt or you'll be sleeping rough and begging for aid! Trade items for profit, and collect the equipment for the conditions you'll face: but too much luggage will slow you down...80 DAYS is a breakneck race, with an in-game clock that never stops running. Trains, steamers, hot-air balloons, boats, camels, horses and more leave and arrive minute by minute. Every city and journey is narrated via an interactive story where you control every action. Will your choices speed you up - or lead you into disaster? Will you earn Fogg's trust and respect? Will you uncover the secrets and short-cuts that can shave days off your time? Murder, romance, rebellion and intrigue await! The app is network-connected, with a live feed that shows you the position of all the other players of the game, their routes, triumphs and disasters. You can race to be the fastest - or look ahead to learn the secrets of the world.Share your own journey with friends, and load other's routes directly into your app so you can race head-to-head.
descriptionHTML:
1872, with a steampunk twist. Phileas Fogg has wagered he can circumnavigate the world in just eighty days.

* TIME's #1 Game of the Year 2014
* "We’ve been dreaming about this future for decades. Guess what? It’s here." - New York Times
* "Interactive storytelling as its best" - The Guardian

Choose your own route around a 3D globe, travelling by airship, submarine, mechanical camel, steam-train and more, racing other players and a clock that never stops.

Featuring a brand new journey - to the North Pole!

* "This brilliant interactive novel re-imagines Phileas Fogg's journey around the world... One of the finest examples of branching narrative yet created." - The Telegraph

* "For people who love high adventures and good writing, 80 Days is a voyage that must be taken" - The Verge

* "A brilliantly paced, memorable and quite frankly terrific piece of modern interactive fiction, that masterfully blends strategy, resource management and adventure" - IndieGames.com

150 cities to explore. Detailed research and techno-fantasy combine in an 1872 of tensions, inventions and exploration. Climb the Burmese mountains, trek the Zulu Federation, sail up the Amazon and disappear under the Indian Ocean - but don't fall behind the time!

* "This is modern storytelling that engages and delights, and the bold, stylish artwork gives 80 Days almost a graphic novel feel. Pack your case, armchair Passepartout - adventure awaits!" - Joystiq

* "Is it a game? Is it a story? Both, really. And a delight." - The Telegraph - Best Novels of 2014

* "Could be the best interactive fiction game out there" - 148 Apps

* "A sublime video game to immerse yourself in" - The Examiner

* "One of the most extraordinarily memorable and unique games I’ve played in years" - Pocket Tactics

* "Everything about this game is perfect" - AppAdvice

* "Innovative and extraordinary, and unpredictable fun" - Apps Zoom

* "Rich with ideas, brilliantly written, and creates a world that you'll want to visit over and over again" - PocketGamer (gold award)

Featuring stunning art by Jaume Illustration, a half-million word script by Meg Jayanth, original music by Laurence Chapman, and built using the same inklewriter engine that powers our critically-acclaimed Sorcery! series, 80 DAYS is an interactive adventure created by your choices, on the fly, and is different every time you play.

Playing as Phileas Fogg's loyal valet, Passepartout, you must balance your master's health, your finances, and the time, as you choose your own path from city to city all the way around the world. Bribe your way onto early departures, but don't let yourself go bankrupt or you'll be sleeping rough and begging for aid! Trade items for profit, and collect the equipment for the conditions you'll face: but too much luggage will slow you down...

80 DAYS is a breakneck race, with an in-game clock that never stops running. Trains, steamers, hot-air balloons, boats, camels, horses and more leave and arrive minute by minute.

Every city and journey is narrated via an interactive story where you control every action. Will your choices speed you up - or lead you into disaster? Will you earn Fogg's trust and respect? Will you uncover the secrets and short-cuts that can shave days off your time? Murder, romance, rebellion and intrigue await!

The app is network-connected, with a live feed that shows you the position of all the other players of the game, their routes, triumphs and disasters. You can race to be the fastest - or look ahead to learn the secrets of the world.

Share your own journey with friends, and load other's routes directly into your app so you can race head-to-head.
developerAddress: 18 Brampton Road, Cambridge CB1 3HL, United Kingdom
recentChanges: "Good news, Master Fogg! I have successfully re-established contact with our fellow voyagers. Once again, their journeys will be displayed on our map as we travel around the world!"
Fogg peered over his newspaper. "And our own journeys‚Äî?"

"Conversely and likewise! Although of course," I added with a discreet cough, "our names shall not be shared unless we so choose." As I had become well aware, despite his globe-spanning feats, Master Fogg was curiously wary of his privacy.
summary: Phileas Fogg has wagered he can circumnavigate the world in just eighty days.
title: 80 Days

comments: The ads are a real pita.  You can get rid of the sound by turning your media volume all the way down.    Also even after I uninstalled it I started getting occasional ads.  They must have left some hidden app on my phone.  That's not at all cool.    I love the game play, the hints and the possibility of choosing a game you know can be won.  I wish they'd just offer a paid as free version but I suppose they make more money from advertisers than they'd make by charging.

Its a relaxing game to enjoy. It is competitive, but not over bearing to where all there is, is competition. I have always been a fan of solitaire games since they were on windows pc computers on dial up if we wanted to play a game its mostly all we had lol when the connections went down. The game is well made and doesn't have that many ads for a free game its nice. Well done

It is a beautiful well balanced game, however too many ads, and unable to turn off sounds on the ads. The algorithm could be a bit harder. I knows it's a money maker for you with no real incentive to offer a paid version. But I would gladly pay $1 to rid the ads.

This game sucks i did try to win one game and i did try all solutions without sucsess.. if the game dosent give you right to win (than this is not a game) some rounds have no solution just to make you losse some points.. idk to explain in english! Can't upload pic of my last round!

The game play is nice, and the ads are not to intrusive, but i am giving this a one star because of the AUDIBLE ads. The seem to only come o  at night and gets VERY annoying. Especially when my wife or kids are sleeping and then this rediculously loud add pops up and you cant skip it.

The game itself is good: Unlimited undo moves is nice, the hints are usually helpful, and the "wining game" option is awesome BUT the number and type of ads (usually ones that can't be navigated away from for at least a couple of seconds) are ridiculous! Open up the app => you get an ad...Finish or restart a game => there's another ad...Change the mode you are playing in => yep, you get hit with an ad...Switch to another app then return to play the game you already watched the ad for => about half the time you are forced to sit through yet another ad! Sometimes you get lucky and an ad doesn't play under one of those circumstances, but it is a rare occurrence. I'm going to try to find a less irritating solitar game because after just 1 week with this app is getting to be too much for me :/

comments: An option to download the next 20+ levels would be fantastic! I live in an area with awful reception and half the time it is too bad to load the next level. Being able to download them while at work (where I do get a good signal) would help a ton.

Wonderful!! I love this game!!  I had wanted a nice little game app that I could use when you find your self with some down time like waiting rooms at the Dr. or pharmacy, etc...  This one FAR exceeded all of my expectations. The pictures are BREATHTAKING. I especially love the wilderness scenes. But there is a very nice mix of stunning architecture, city scenes from all over the world, neighborhoods from many different cultures, GORGEOUS Sunsets, Pastural sceens, it's all there. Finding the difference is more challenging than you might think. They really challenged me sometimes and I hate to admit this but I did have to use the 'hint' button a few times üò∂  LOL. This game is for everyone. All ages! I haven't had the chance to let my grandkids try it yet but I'm interested in how fast they will be able to find things. This app is perfect for keeping ones mind sharp and for teaching children how to be observant and Have a diserning eye.  I HIGHLY recommend this app.

Beautiful pictures. Challenging without being frustrating. Glad to have found a modestly difficult game that's not timed. But, then I discovered my calculated "Ave. time to find 1 difference" in the apps "Statistics". The challenge now...don't scream when you get stuck at 9/10. lol.   Would be nice to see others stats. So far, with 251/1010 images complete, no hints used....19 seconds per find. My eye muscles have never been stronger. I wonder how many up/down/up/down/up/down/up/down speed glances I've made.   Great game.

Great app. Glad I read responses to reviews, it explained my questions. Glad to see developers actually responding to problems people may be having. I only have 1 problem with this app and that is "It's addicting"!

I like the game, the pictures, the challenge of it all, but I'm uninstalling because there is an ad, or a pop up asking me to rate or tell a friend after every finished game screen. and they are those long annoying 5 second ads that also have sound. I'm sure I can find another game to play and help me relax without so many ads. if you don't mind ads every few minutes, then this is a good game. if excessive ads annoy and distract you, you might want to look elsewhere.
I love the game so much. The beautiful scenes, it helps me relax myself n work on my sight.  But I don't like the issue of downloading level all the time. Its annoying!
description: Spot the difference (Find The Difference) is a puzzle and casual game that will allow you to relax and to get pleasure from finding objects on a beautiful images!What is and isn't in our super new app:Briefly:1) More levels than other games (will be more than 1000, now 900+, not 300)2) No timer3) Tips/Hints and skips levels4) HD and qHD photos5) 10 differences in each picture6) Optimized for phones and tablets7) Cool zoom functionality8) Save and resuming levels9) Informing about new levels10) Music and sounds11) Different themes of the background photosFull:1) Timer is optional - play, think and search as you like, no racing with a time!2) Not 100 or even 300, but 1000+ interest levels will wait for you. No more needed to go often to the apps store to download a new version of Find differences - there are enough levels for a long time in our Spot The Difference 2017 game! Stay tuned - new levels will be constantly added and will be available to download for free right from the game. Just click Play button and built-in downloader will get new levels from our server.3) Renewable hints and skips levels will help you if you get stuck in this colorful world of differences.4) You are free to choose between of using HD or qHD photos in game (HD photo requires more internet traffic but has a better quality).5) On each picture you will find not 5, not 7, but 10 differences! 6) All the differences and the hidden objects are optimized for a normal game - you don't have to find a small point or a small block of pixels, independently mobile phone or tablet is used.7) Zoom of the image will allow you to find all the hidden differences on your device regardless of how you have a vision and whether you wear glasses. Now the search is a pleasure!8) Jump over and finish complex levels later.9) Be online with access to the Internet and you will be sent news about the new levels - your phone will play some ringtone and add a text notification in the device system bar.10) Enable or disable music and sounds.11) Large variety of the backgrounds themes: landscapes, nature, cars, buildings and even beautiful girls can be met by you on the expanses of searching for differences. We tried to select for you the most beautiful, cool and live photos.Welcome to the diverse, interesting and colorful world of find differences.Did you know such kind of a free games are often calls as Spot the difference or Spot it or What's different.How to play: just find a difference and tap it on any image.Discover what's the difference between two photos which only seems identical but there are ten differences to find!Some sites and apps offer ready-made recipes for quickly finding differences, but much more fun to find everything yourself. Stay like a king of the differences - conquer all the levels!All the levels in the game is free and will give a lot of joy to both children and adults.Don't forget to switch on a wifi or mobile data on your device for access to the entire levels database.The battle of your mind and vision against our artist's skills begins! But we hope that after such an acquaintance our artist will become for you as a good friend.Put our "Spot different game" on the 'shelf' where you store your favorite and useful apps and your collection will become more complete.Download Spot the Difference and share it with everyone! ‚ÄúFind the differences games‚Äù are excellent for playing in a pair ‚Äì play these ‚Äúspot it games‚Äù with your friend and relatives.Our Find Differences game is already loved by both children and adults, both girls and boys, both men and women.Get ready for a best photo hunt of your life and join to our team of lovers of "Find the differences" and puzzle games!All pictures and photos for levels taken with the personal permission of the author of the image or with a suitable license.All images were makeup in photo editor and have differeces with original photos.

5) On each picture you will find not 5, not 7, but 10 differences!
6) All the differences and the hidden objects are optimized for a normal game - you don't have to find a small point or a small block of pixels, independently mobile phone or tablet is used.
7) Zoom of the image will allow you to find all the hidden differences on your device regardless of how you have a vision and whether you wear glasses. Now the search is a pleasure!
8) Jump over and finish complex levels later.
9) Be online with access to the Internet and you will be sent news about the new levels - your phone will play some ringtone and add a text notification in the device system bar.
10) Enable or disable music and sounds.
11) Large variety of the backgrounds themes: landscapes, nature, cars, buildings and even beautiful girls can be met by you on the expanses of searching for differences. We tried to select for you the most beautiful, cool and live photos.

Welcome to the diverse, interesting and colorful world of find differences.
Did you know such kind of a free games are often calls as Spot the difference or Spot it or What's different.

How to play: just find a difference and tap it on any image.
Discover what's the difference between two photos which only seems identical but there are ten differences to find!

Some sites and apps offer ready-made recipes for quickly finding differences, but much more fun to find everything yourself. Stay like a king of the differences - conquer all the levels!

All the levels in the game is free and will give a lot of joy to both children and adults.

Don't forget to switch on a wifi or mobile data on your device for access to the entire levels database.

The battle of your mind and vision against our artist's skills begins! But we hope that after such an acquaintance our artist will become for you as a good friend.
Put our "Spot different game" on the 'shelf' where you store your favorite and useful apps and your collection will become more complete.
Download Spot the Difference and share it with everyone! “Find the differences games” are excellent for playing in a pair – play these “spot it games” with your friend and relatives.
Our Find Differences game is already loved by both children and adults, both girls and boys, both men and women.

Get ready for a best photo hunt of your life and join to our team of lovers of "Find the differences" and puzzle games!

All pictures and photos for levels taken with the personal permission of the author of the image or with a suitable license.
All images were makeup in photo editor and have differeces with original photos.
recentChanges: Added timer (it is an optional feature, use it or not - it's up to you).
summary: 960+ levels in one game! Seek and find 10 differences in 2 beauty images!
title: Find The Difference

comments: I like the concept so far. I always wanted to play Sims on the go; now I can. I wonder if this game simulates life accurately. You can't have a life sim game without being able to make your avatar a member of the LGBTQA community. This is why I like Second Life. It allows me to be me (gay and proud) and doesn't judge. Will definitely add five üåü s if this feature is added along with In-game events that allows you to pursue your chosen lifestyle.

ANYONE WHO GIVES THIS GAME A LOW RATING NEEDS TO SIT DOWN . I love that u have more customization with face and body structure similar to the way you do on Sims 4. The graphics in general are nice. My favorite part is that it's online. I love being able to chat with other Sims users and add them n stuff. Also am glad its not in real time ... I hate having to wait hours on FreePlay to get stuff done. This game is best. Lovelovelove

I was so excited that the game is finally released untill when i want to start the game, the game starts with just the opening EA and Maxis title and then the game close it self. Is this a bug? My phone works well with other heavy games but how it cannot run The Sims Mobile?? Please fix this and i will change my rating! I use Lenovo Vibe K5.

So far so good. Its better than the Sims Freeplay. I'd love it more if it was more like the actual sims. Please change the way this game is. Make it to where we can cook, and choose our sims personality traits, have babies, die lol/legacies, go to work for 8 hrs and actually make a decent amount of simoleons, actually have freedom you know? The actual sims gameplay!!! I love the task list and how we do have to unlock new worlds and items, but it'll be more exciting to unlock stuff to me if this game was more like the original sims. If we had the opportunity to play all day non stop like the original sims, I believe everyone would enjoy the game more. Please make a change to the game and make it more like the actual sims!!!

It's not everything I wanted, that's for sure. This is a great game and I really enjoy working aspect is fun. The rest is boring. Little customization for sim, cannot interect with others like I thought and have to level up to customize house which is sad. I wish we could start with a little more, even have to unlock our personality. Whats up with that? Overall this seems like a really good game but its not the sims I was expecting

In short.. been waiting to see what this had to offer.  Not a bad game. Granted it is way Better than "sims freeplay" however I expected more from EA. It's a nice app. Gameplay is good. Graphics are better than I thought. The in app purchases are what will get you.  For me though the Sims pc is where it's still at, for me anyway nothing beats the PC Version either Sims 3 or 4 Both are very good.   But there's enough here to tickle anyone's fancy. Hats off to the devs on this mobile game version!
