comments: The food should provide more energy per dollar as it gets better, not less. 5 energy food costs 5 dollars, 10 energy food costs 12 dollars. How does that make any sense? What possible incentive is there to not only buy the cheapest food?
It's ok it's both harder and easier than the first game but it'll improve with time.
Great! Better than the first one!

Why did you abandon the first game? I feel like it was more realistic and had far more features. It was really good and could have been polished and updated, you had a good one on your hands. Are you planning on adding in some of the features that you had in the first game? This one just seems downgraded. Overall, it's still better than 99% of life simulators, I just wished you had continued to build on the first one.

I love this game. Just as good, if not better than the first. Reading through the negative reviews, I find most of their reasoning for bad ratings to be silly. The developer is super helpful and friendly. I'm looking forward to spending a long time on this game and possibly replaying it's predecessor.

The game is nice and all, love everything about it, it isn't annoyingly stupid to make money. However, recently when trying to buy food, it came up with saying I didn't have money, even though i pulled 72 dollars from my bank. It said that for all except Ramen, that said I didn't have space (my fridge is completely empty) I restarted the app, and now they all say i dont have space.
description: Welcome to the second entry in the Life Simulator series! New and improved visuals, game play, and performance!Life Simulator 2 is all about moving up through the world by going to school, getting a job, and eventually running a successful business! Of course, it's also about amassing the most wealth you possibly can. In Life Simulator 2, you can even see how you compare to other players on the leader board and earn achievements based on your progress!You can reset the game and start over at any time to earn a multiplier based on your current life's progress.Tired of all those other life simulating games that just leave you wanting more?Look no further! Here, life is good!Life simulation is a fun and addicting way to make your life whatever you want it to be!All the other life simulators out there just don't hit the mark for me. I set out to create a game that you can play to pass the time while you're doing what you've always wanted to do.As in real life, the fastest and best way to make a ton of cash is to run a business or play the stock market. You can even blow all your money gambling at the casino!When you reset, your score is calculated based on how successful you were. A multiplier will be applied to your next life based on this score.Each life is better than the last, if you play your cards right. It's better than real life, it's better than your life, it's simulated life!Download now, and leave a review if you enjoy the game!Support for tablets added!Things to come in next updates include:-More of existing content (majors, items, jobs, casino games, etc.).-More achievements.-Any other suggestions people might have for the game in its current state!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the second entry in the Life Simulator series! New and improved visuals, game play, and performance!

Life Simulator 2 is all about moving up through the world by going to school, getting a job, and eventually running a successful business! Of course, it's also about amassing the most wealth you possibly can. In Life Simulator 2, you can even see how you compare to other players on the leader board and earn achievements based on your progress!

You can reset the game and start over at any time to earn a multiplier based on your current life's progress.

Tired of all those other life simulating games that just leave you wanting more?
Look no further! Here, life is good!

Life simulation is a fun and addicting way to make your life whatever you want it to be!

All the other life simulators out there just don't hit the mark for me.
I set out to create a game that you can play to pass the time while you're doing what you've always wanted to do.

As in real life, the fastest and best way to make a ton of cash is to run a business or
play the stock market. You can even blow all your money gambling at the casino!

When you reset, your score is calculated based on how successful you were. A multiplier will be applied to your next life based on this score.

Each life is better than the last, if you play your cards right.

It's better than real life, it's better than your life, it's simulated life!

Download now, and leave a review if you enjoy the game!

Support for tablets added!

Things to come in next updates include:

-More of existing content (majors, items, jobs, casino games, etc.).
-More achievements.
-Any other suggestions people might have for the game in its current state!
developerAddress:
14 S Lake Ave. APT 1
Albany, NY 12203
recentChanges: Added a backup save and improved saving functions to fix data loss issues - Potentially fixed a slight problem when dealing with daylight saving time - Fixed Welcome Back box - Fixed Life Reset bug - Fixed Achievement and Leaderboard buttons - more fixes to come tomorrow!
summary: Get a job! Grow your business! Go to school! Play the stock market and casino!
title: Life Simulator 2

comments: I understand that you wanna make more money then you have, but you have ads every 2 plays! 5 games? Okay. 10 games? Great. But 2? Seriously. And then there is that stupid ad bar at the bottom. When I slide across the screen, sometimes my finger goes down, right on the ad. Yay? I think not. Why do you think this game is rated a 3.8?

I love the game but I paid to remove the adds and guess what I still am getting littered with adds that is complete b.s. I want my money back. Paying for no adds and still getting adds. I could and should bring a civil court law suit up over this either fix the problem or refund my money.
God I hate the voodoo developers, they come up with cool game ideas but then just litter the game with ads and ruin it.. I understand some ads but god damn theres an and every 30 seconds.

JUST AWFUL!!! The whole thing stinks. Not because of the app asking me for my card before downloading it, not because of thing being riddled with ads and especially not because of the fact that this is like all the other run if the mill apps that many will play for a bit or so and just get borde and never play it agian; or just out-right uninstaling it. It is all because of one simple reason. The missed opportunity of bounceing on my boi while playing this. I mean, I just can't play this stupid game and bounce on my boi at the same time! I mean are trying to exclude the people who want to bang and play a game at the same time? And you can't do that to us. In fact It all makes me think that you guys are rasist, homophobic and white privileged fascist. And all of that just don't seem right to me, just like 9/11.

I always play games with music in the background and while playing this game my music would be constantly shut off because of the ads, I don't mind the ads themselves, just the fact that it constantly interrupts other sounds playing on the system is very irritating. Gave you 2 stars for a nice game, didn't play a lot though so couldn't tell you more.

Don't bother downloading. Asks loads of permissions that it doesn't require on install. Game would be OK but as others have said the developers have shot themselves in the foot by showing locked ads even when u don't choose to continue. VOODOO take notice of the reviews, less ads will make you more money in the long run cos like me, people just uninstall!!

description: Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun  or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!

Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.

Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.

It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.

This game is a brand new and amazing puzzle game!

1. Control and shooting to match three or more marble colored balls.

Now you can explore the amazing deluxe game on your lovely device.

comments: I know apps show the best comments first but I'm 24 levels into the first game and here's what its like. The rule for a square changes constantly sometimes its an L shape some times that doesn't count. I found so many ways to do the puzzles that apparently aren't the right way even though they fit the criteria. I really thought I'd like this and a part of me does ... But its only bc I'm looking for ways to do the puzzle that they won't accept. Lol I will be uninstalling it in the morning I'm just too tired to bother with it. Don't waste your time with this. Like its cool if you stump me but I solved it in a valid way and whoops it doesn't register

Like others have said, there's many ways to solve the puzzle. However, the game wants it done a particular way. But never once does it tell you which way it wants it done. So you'll finish the puzzle multiple times but it won't allow you to win unless you do it their way but it'll never tell you. Would give 5 stars but that's just dumb. It is a good game otherwise.

The game doesn't save your solutions. You have to solve the puzzle again from scratch. Some might not care, but others might. I think the next version should include a save solution feature. The graphics are garish and ugly. Would prefer something clean and lean. But, I love solving the puzzles.

Gameplay is ok but this biggest problem with this app is that it removes your ability to use the native Android back, home, and app flip buttons. Instead, the only way to get out of the app is to navigate back to the get home screen and hit an obscure power button. It's very clunky and odd.

Great game keeps you thinking. The game can be played for short periods or long which ever suits you. I like the fact that the levels don't progressively get harder, there is a good mix of difficulty. Good game guys.

Loved this game. The only complaint I have is that this is supposed to be a puzzle type game. Dnt get me wrong like that they use equations an stuff but why so many would love 2 be able to do more puzzle than maths if you get my meaning

comments: More like 4 1/2 Awesome game, all te components you'd want in one. Just hit a few "laggy" spots where game didn't want to respond. Other than that, would be a 5 star!  Bonus game is also top notch and quite lengthy! Well done Big Fish - as expected!  Can't wait for sequel!

JUST FINISHED DEMO...I'm not sold on Frozen Beauty yet! The scenery is lovely but the game play is just too straight forward and easy despite having selected the most difficult level of play. There is a guide but I didn't need it this far.

There is a scene that I cannot get passed! It is a blue rose and another rose and there are 5 round tiles you change for a code. There is a piece of paper that has 4 out of 5 tiles. Butterfly, ladybug and 2 others. Can't move past this area.

I enjoyed the game. Never had to skip a mini game, although some of them were pretty tedious, use hints to solve puzzles or HOG's. I would have given it a five if not for the awful, whining,  simpering fairest princesses. Wow! Who ever designed those horrors knows nothing about female taste!

This was a fun game. Even though I don't care for paying $4 bucks to play a game, this one was nice and long with an extra bonus chapter. I like having unlimited "helps" so you never get stuck. Overall, very enjoyable.

Fun game It was fairly pricey but it did have a long game play.  Some of the words used for objects in the hidden objects game did quite match what they actually wanted.  Interactive map was great. Biggest complaint is with the ads that kept popping up even though I had paid for the game.

descriptionHTML:
Assemblr is a content creation platform that facilitates you to create 3D content that is visualized in the form of Augmented Reality.

------

Get your fingers ready for a build-off on Assemblr! With an ever-expanding collections of geometrical-shaped block and a vast array of predefined 3D components, players can start building anything in the free-build mode, and place their virtual masterpieces in the real world! Explore the world of Assemblr by discovering and appreciating numerous projects created by a thriving community of fellow hunters and builders as you shape the world around you.

Assemblr is free to play, however, we offer in-app purchases. Also, under our Terms of Service and End User License Agreement, you must be at least 8 years of age to play or download Assemblr.

A network connection is also required.


Features:
‒ Build Mode
With 3D view, Augmented Reality mode or even first person view, you can create and build anything you want with hundreds of materials. Set an earthquake or even bring an entire flood to the map and see what would happen to your creation!

‒ Explore
Discover and appreciate artworks around you! Explore and show some appreciation of your own by liking, sharing and commenting on other users’ Assemblr projects and creations.

‒ Collaboration (Beta)
Team up with friends and family to build a creation at the same time! Collaborate, manage or even direct your team.

‒ Geoquest (Coming Soon)
Explore your neighborhood or even the world to hunt for new materials and items. Find hidden stores and portals all around the map and acquire limited items before your friends do!

‒ Competition (Coming Soon)
Competitions are held every week and month, and also varies by themes and rules. Acquire unique rewards such as rare materials and items!

description: Max Unblock is a fun and classic addictive puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of its way with the minimal amount of moves. Max Unblock comes with 4 difficulties of puzzles. There are 200+ puzzles in total, the highest amount of puzzles you'll find in any logic block game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and hooked.[How to play]The red block escape to the exit.Horizontal blocks can move from side to side.Vertical blocks can be moved up and downFEATURES‚Ä¢ 200+ puzzles in total for you to enjoy‚Ä¢ Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles‚Ä¢ Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle‚Ä¢ Smooth and delicate animation‚Ä¢ 4 difficulty level: easy to expert‚Ä¢ Try to enjoy the "Max Unblock‚Äù using various devices and screen sizesMax Unblock have been used in many schools to help improve kids with their brain functions in school and in their pastime. Not only for kids, Max Unblock can keep you mentally fit every day. It will improve your cognitive abilities such as attention, concentration and logic reasoning.
descriptionHTML:
Max Unblock is a fun and classic addictive puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of its way with the minimal amount of moves. Max Unblock comes with 4 difficulties of puzzles. There are 200+ puzzles in total, the highest amount of puzzles you'll find in any logic block game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and hooked.

[How to play]
The red block escape to the exit.
Horizontal blocks can move from side to side.
Vertical blocks can be moved up and down

FEATURES
• 200+ puzzles in total for you to enjoy
• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles
• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
• Smooth and delicate animation
• 4 difficulty level: easy to expert
• Try to enjoy the "Max Unblock” using various devices and screen sizes

Max Unblock have been used in many schools to help improve kids with their brain functions in school and in their pastime. Not only for kids, Max Unblock can keep you mentally fit every day. It will improve your cognitive abilities such as attention, concentration and logic reasoning.

Draw.ly is an amazing coloring game designed for adults and children. It’s completely FREE! No need to subscribe, all pictures can be unlocked with coins! There’re tons of interesting pixel arts for you to color, and more updated daily; you’ll never run out of coloring materials!

Download for FREE now and have fun coloring!

descriptionHTML:
Think, search, swipe and connect all letters into words!

What is Wordsdom?
An interesting word game with endless fun!
Thousands of puzzles of words!
The best choice for family and friends!

What are you waiting for? Just click and start to play! Challenge yourself!
Play Wordsdom, the addictive word puzzle game, for once and you can’t stop playing it! More importantly, Wordsdom is a free game and you can play it whenever you like, wherever you are. The fun is ready for you anytime!

How to play:
• Easy to learn. Swipe your finger over letters, search, connect and combine a word.
• Flexible to control. Connecting words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards.
• Plain and clear. If you've found a valid word it will remain highlighted and marked on the word list as found.

Wordsdom is more than special!
• Simple, easy, and addictive puzzle gameplay!
• 2000+ levels with infinite word puzzles await you!
• Login every day to get a wonderful daily bonus for FREE to unlock higher levels and solve more puzzles!
• Enjoyable graphics will bring you and your friends a brilliant puzzle memory of words!
• Without time limit, you can use time wisely to find new words and solve puzzles at your own pace!
• No Wifi? Don’t worry, play Wordsdom and clear word puzzles anytime, anywhere!
• Support both phones and tablets.
• FREE update to unlock more word puzzles!

Wordsdom is a perfect choice for fans of classic word search or swipe games and crossword puzzles. Try not to guess but to use your word intelligence so as to solve difficult puzzles more efficiently. And remember to share the fun with your family and friends, so as to enjoy this addictive Wordsdom together!
We sincerely hope that you can have a good time with our word puzzle game. So if you have any comments, questions or feedback, please contact us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Wordsdom2018
recentChanges: - Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience!
Enjoy Wordsdom and thanks for your support!

comments: Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Nice game Not true curling but closer then any game I have played so far and it's still fun.  There seems to be a glich where stones jump to a different position after the throw, but doesn't happen often.  There is no hog line violation and it's difficult to promote so most games end up being a culster f in the 4ft.  Once you realize it's a game and not real curling your addicted.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: A superb implementation of sudoku, with an intuitive and helpful interface. It would be nice to allow us to input our own sudoku, but other than that, this game is complete. A big minus is that the adverts come with sound; this is disruptive and entirely unnecessary.

Now that it is possible to pay to remove ads it's a 5. Minor issues: the note highlight should be a dimmer colour than placed numbers, it should not be possible to put a note over a placed number, or at least this behaviour should be a selectable option. If these 3 things are sorted out it will be a five star from me.
Just AWESOME, the design is incredibly good and the themes feature just stunning. My new favorite Sudoku app by far. The only thing I wish it had is handwriting recognition.
Great app and the best for Sudoku and I'm updating my review to 5 stars for the option to remove ads. I bought it and am happy now. :)
THE TIME TO BE A TRUE GAMER IS HERE!! prepare your ANUS
I'd give this a perfect score if there was an option to buy to remove ads. 3-5-18 edit: they added an option to remove ads. Sweet! Goes to 5 star for me!

comments: Game started off fine, and it's challenging. I seem to be finding that the higher up in levels you get the more issues there are. Game keeps crashing and restarting, I have a lot of times I don't get my whole free time awarded to me. I am seriously considering uninstalling this game because these issues are taking the fun out of it.

Overall is addicting, but I'm so pissed off that the game keep on crashing at level 754. Whenever I was almost winning, the game will crash. I even rebooted my phone but it still happened! When I was losing that level, the game was totally fine. Thank god there's a 24hr free lives right now, but I will uninstall it if this problem is not rectified asap.

It would be 5 stars but the game pauses and freezes a lot.  When it freezes it takes away a  life, any boosts bought and won't send you to the next level even if you win. It also takes forever to load. Even after installing Google Play Games, it still freezes and takes forever load. pleeeease fix these glitches, I don't want to have to start playing Toy Blast üòê

This game makes it too apparent that they want you to spend money with them. Games are more fun when you get so caught up in them that spending money on them is just an afterthought. This game is designed to stop you from winning in to many different ways. The birds that are supposed to help you only screw up your strategy most of the time, and I have seen bubbles just reappear. Not joking, literally watched them just appear out of nowhere. I have seen too many ways in which a win can be taken away from you. So, it feels a little unfair and forced. I understand it is business, but it seems to be designed to be a little to greedy for my taste.

Terrible freezing,  while playing. In losing lives and boosters.  YOU NEED TO FIX THIS,  IF YOU'RE GOING TO WANT GAMERS TO SPEND MONEY... Update.. Almost a year later, its STILL CRASHING.. Quick question developer... "Do you ever give this app and comments any attention!!??!?!?!"..
My only complaint, the stupid 5 lives thing.  Later in the game when it's tough I end up having to stop playing because I'm out of life.

descriptionHTML:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 600 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!

Features:
· 600+ FUN LEVELS – with more added weekly!
· PICK UP AND PLAY – any time, any place even OFFLINE!
· TEASE YOUR BRAIN – with challenging & strategic gameplay!
· CREATE BOOSTERS – rockets, bombs, laser guns!
· DAILY CHALLENGES – earn free rewards and boosters!
· WEEKLY EVENTS – Mighty League, Treasure Hunt and more!
· PUZZLE CHASE – find pieces to new puzzles every month!
· PLAY WITH FRIENDS – connect to Facebook, yo!
· GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS – earn your spot with high scores!


----------------

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/

----------------

Angry Birds Blast! is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast! Get it? I’ll see myself out...

descriptionHTML:
What’s your favorite holiday? Thanksgiving? Christmas? Why, it’s BLACK FRIDAY, of course!!! Get psyched - this year, you get to experience Black Friday for as long as you want and enjoy all the new fashion trends! Get ready to shop your heart out at your favorite fashion stores, to take advantage of the hottest sales at the mall, and to get your shop on in this mall world game!!! You crazy shopaholic, you!

Hey there, shopper! Your expert shopping mall skills are finally about to pay off! With this amazing shopaholic Black Friday shopping mall game, you get to shop ‘til you drop at every fashion store in the mall and find the coolest fashion trends. And don’t worry about running out of money - compete in fashion contests to win coins for you to shop with! Read, set, SHOP!

Features:
> It’s the big Black Friday shopaholic sale season - enjoy it at the mall!
> Participate in catwalk contests with other shoppers. From movie premiere to red carpet, there are so many fun fashion contest themes! Will you win first place?!
> Get incredible Black Friday discounts for you to use at your favorite fashion stores in the mall, to your heart’s desire!
> Uh-oh! All the shoppers are eyeing that last item! Get ready to fight those shopaholics so you’re the first to grab the latest fashion trends!
> So much makeup for you to try at the shopping mall! Experiment with face tattoos and a cool new eyeliner color!
> Dress up, dress up and more dress up! Buy the coolest new outfits, accessories and jewelry in awesome fashion stores like Supreme, Fashionara and Bling Me!
> Have a blast in the shopping mall photo booth! Make silly faces and keep the pictures as a crazy shopping day souvenir!
> Get supercool new fashion hairstyles at the hair salon! Maybe it’s time to dye your hair a new color!
> Come back every day to get a daily bonus! Win more money to spend, spend, spend!

comments: Did this game have a difficulty change over night? I was easily clearing and prestigeing each day at 530, now I am struggling to pass 480 and all I've done is upgrade trinkets. Love the game, put much money into it but I feel like the game is balancing itself to my level to stop me from progressing, meaning I have to put MORE money into it.

Boring. Great time killer if you feel like wasting your time tapping the screen like a mindless idiot. There are about 8 different currencies you can try to earn or pay for. Why in the world someone would pay to speed up to another point in the game where you do the same mindless tapping is beyond comprehension. It's the same look. I feel like I'm taking crazy pills.   Whatever. People are dumb. The game is boring. Uninstalling.

Its ok. But can't get past level 530. Got my stats up to the 13 millions and still can't get past 500 with ease. Its like the more I level up the more it auto balances to my new stats. Getting tiring. Says it goes to 1000 but I'm not seeing that anytime soon. Been working toward level 600 for weeks now.
Fun little progression game. Just one small issue, playing over 2 devices I have to keep reinstalling to get the progress to stay in sync
A very addictive game that if just added effects during battles to make it seem more lively and less dull. To keep from being boring through the "grind".

Very fun(ny) and addictive game!  I've never seen a single bug in this game.  I do wish scraps were easier to come by though... here's an idea.  You know how a video ad dragon can drop 15 gems but I can also watch a video sans dragon and get 10?  Well... how about letting me watch ads to get 20 scraps per video in the same way?  Either way still love this game.

descriptionHTML:
Almost A Hero is probably one of the most addicting RPG clicker games you will find out there today. In this incremental RPG clicker game, you will meet 13 wannabe heroes, also known as the most useless idiots to walk this earth, who embark on a quest to be slightly less useless idiots.

They say never give a loser an even chance. We say different.

Your team of almost heroes is a bunch of deeply unique and deeply flawed individuals who have been chosen for greatness. Heroic, noble, enlightened... Just 3 of the many words they can’t spell. They will set off on an epic journey that will turn them from zeroes to almost heroes. Or dead people. More likely the latter.

Join these zeroes on a quest to become (almost) heroes in an ancient land. Train them to learn battle skills, magical powers and which end of a sword is the business end.

If you are into clicker games, RPG clicker game or incremental idle games, get ready to discover your next serious addiction with “Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Game”.

In AaH you’ll find idle heroes with upgrades, quests, ancient artifacts and secrets to unlock to become almost heroes. Oh, and there’s lots of clicking to do. Yup, that’s what clicker games are all about. Have you nearly got what it takes to become almost a hero?

Download one of the most addicting clicker games, Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Games today and lead your idle heroes to victory before it’s too late!

descriptionHTML:
Extreme Jeep racing thanks to its advanced off-road real physics engine. Enjoy the realistic physics, detailed, offroad 4x4 vehicles. Now you can add the fastest 4x4 Jeep SUV and experience a sports rally driver in this free game! You will drive car in mountain rocky environments, in the winter on the snow, races on ground and asphalt roads and safari - desert car simulator. comments: So far I've been enjoying it. It's nothing too special, typical mobile fighting game but Tekken. The fact that's it Tekken makes it more enjoyable than average because I love Tekken, but that's just me. I feel that acquiring new characters needs to be way easier than it is, especially when you need to take on harder missions for bonus materials and currency. I don't like how you have to wait for characters health to regenerate. If characters healths auto filled per mission, I would definitely put more time into the game. Since it isn't, I have to constantly stop playing and wait for the health to refill, and I don't wait to use healing items because it takes away from my in game currency, which itself is difficult to obtain if you aren't constantly grinding. Aside from that, it's fun. Very fun, I recommend.

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

This game is beautiful! I have always loved Tekken ever since the 1st and have played them all. I only wish some of my favorite characters weren't missing, like Lei and Bryan and I haven't seen Yoshimitsu or Heihachi Mishima. Overall I am very impressed. Thanks, I have been waiting for this on Android for a long time! I would rate 4.5 stars ‚ò∫

Am I ever going to play this game?  All it does is download stuff Update:. Graphics are great, game play is ok, seems like I'm just hitting random parts of my screen.  Healing component is going to make me uninstall.  There's no area to practice to figure out what you're actually doing.

Minimum Requirements: Android 5.0, 2 Gb memory and CPU Samsung Exynos 8890/Qualcomm Snapdragon 820 or higher.

TEKKEN, the world's most successful fighting game franchise has been brought to mobile! Join PAUL, KAZUYA, XIAOYU, LAW, PANDA, NINA & all other famous fighters to engage in an intuitive, deep combat system featuring fighting techniques from all around the world. Take on the role of the Dojo Master, collecting, upgrading and battling with your favourite fighters from the legendary TEKKEN franchise!

WHAT'S YOUR NEXT MOVE?

TEKKEN FEATURES
• Collect over 20 characters with unique fighting styles
• Upgrade and unlock over 20 unique special moves for each fighter

comments: I do enjoy this kind of game. I've completed thousands of screens worth with blendoku and i love hue, both of which played all the way through at least twice.  This game is basically the same ( more i love hue-ish) and I love that one can look at the pattern after completion, if one wants (instead of instantly moving to next puzzle).  Big downside for me is sickly yellow background.  Black or neutral gray, please!!!  For a color puzzle, a terrible look!!

This game is the perfect time killer, and the producers of this game are so polite: "hi, we hope you enjoy the game :)" how can you dislike a game like this?? And it gives you free backgrounds! I'm so glad I stole my brother's phone that time otherwise I probably wouldn't have found this game. 5 stars for sureeee :)

Never have i been so into a phone game for years since the early angry bird or where's the water. This game is so relaxing, playing this gives me the same feeling as i do my meditation. Stress relief. The finished color patterns are beautiful too
As a game developer myself I wholeheartedly believe this is a masterpiece in design. Anyone could pick it up and learn at their own phase.  Great job, simple concept with excellent execution!
I love it's creativity (but not so much the ads) yet still a game worth playing. 5 out 5 ‚òÜ

Have been playing for a while now, great time passer. Do find it frustrating when getting orbs or dragons as prizes the you get continually get the same orbs. If gotten enough orbs to summon the same dragon 3 times while getting very few  other orbs. Or you get really close to the required number and that orb stops appearing. I am uninstalling this game and I suggest that you don't waste your time with this game.

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!
recentChanges: Dragon City‚Äôs first social update: Play with other Dragon Masters!
- Join Alliances to chat and cooperate with other players!
- There‚Äôs a new element in the game: Primal! Come and discover their behavior in battle and be amazed by their look, a cool mix of dinosaurs, magic, and technology.

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!
summary: üíéCollect awesome dragons and become the ultimate Dragon Master! üê≤
title: Dragon City

comments: Unoriginal concept executed poorly. The controls are buggy making certain levels rely solely on bugging your way through. The only way to win the game is to watch ads to get past the buggier levels. All around a terrible experience.

Don't recommend this to people who have anger issues or want relaxation. Too difficult at times. Good game, but I hated it.

comments: Great but it highlights what dice give points on every roll. That's good for learning the game, but if you already know how to play, then you need only to pay enough attention to bankroll the minimum score per round. Where's the fun in that? Otherwise it's just mindless tapping.

I love the game and been playing for years. Downloaded this tonight and it is a good game, but seems it has way too many farkles and seems to be rigged. Can barely win any games. Did ok starting out betting 50 chips. Once I moved up to 100 chips, played 5 and didn't win once. If I had 2 dice left and rolled I farkled every time, but the other player does same thing and never farkles. Went back to 50 chips and won once. I believe some of these players are bots and the game is rigged.

Started it great!  Shortly after during 1000 coin multiplayer the game wouldn't recognize my roll of 5 4s and forfeited my turn.. I re enterd multilayer 1000 coin and lost the the same person 4 times in a row and never got more than 750 and farkeled 26 times in 4 games and also, I didn't enter rematch to play the same person..  Sad...

Initially the ads were every couple games which was manageable. After the latest update it's at the start and at the end of every game as well as sometimes randomly in the middle. They've become overly intrusive and it is just getting more and more irritating.
Garbage app. Games are rigged, people can cheat. It's no fun when I only get to roll once, then my opponent gets perfect rolls, over and over, and makes 7500 on their ONLY turn. Uninstalling.

You don't win very often! I play the single-player game and I've noticed that with the power dice turned off you can really rack up some points. As soon as you turn them on you very rarely win. Not much fun when you farkle 6-7 times out of 10 while throwing 4-5 dice!
description: Play Farkle Dice Game! We have finally created Farkle for Android.The rules of Farkle are very simple:In 'Multiplayer', you need to accumulate 5000 or 7500 points before your opponent does.In 'Single Player' and 'Tournament', you need to accumulate as many points as you can in 10 moves.You have 6 dice. When you roll them, you get different scoring combinations. In order to bank the points for your score, you need to accumulate at least 300 points. If you roll a Farkle three times in a row, you get -500. If you have not rolled a meaningful scoring combination, you "Farkle" and get 0 points.Full rules are here: http://farkle-game.com/rules.phpThe dice game Farkle is also known as 10000, Greed, Hot Dice, Squelch, Zilch, Dice Poker, Zonk or Farkel.
descriptionHTML:
Play Farkle Dice Game! We have finally created Farkle for Android.

The rules of Farkle are very simple:
In 'Multiplayer', you need to accumulate 5000 or 7500 points before your opponent does.
In 'Single Player' and 'Tournament', you need to accumulate as many points as you can in 10 moves.
You have 6 dice. When you roll them, you get different scoring combinations. In order to bank the points for your score, you need to accumulate at least 300 points. If you roll a Farkle three times in a row, you get -500. If you have not rolled a meaningful scoring combination, you "Farkle" and get 0 points.

Full rules are here: http://farkle-game.com/rules.php

The dice game Farkle is also known as 10000, Greed, Hot Dice, Squelch, Zilch, Dice Poker, Zonk or Farkel.
recentChanges: We Wish You a Merry Christmas!
summary: Farkle Dice Game - board dice game
title: Farkle Dice Game

description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck‚Ä¶! comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

It's casual, relaxing and fun. Super cute. And it has 2 huge pluses: first of all it feels rewarding since you actually have a realistic possibility of getting new fluffies; second, you don't have ads shoved in your face every 5 seconds, in fact you pretty much never see them.  Really great at the moment, hope it stays this way. Lots of respect to the Devs for staying away from annoying cash grab techniques.

this game is adorable. the only thing i'm not quite sure about is the rainbow system; what does it do? how does it work? it would be great to have a page that explains the details to those of us who aren't great at working this stuff out. i'd also like to ask why there aren't plushies for these things??? they're so cute! i'd by tons of they were real. anyway, great game, and the little fluffy cubes are the sweetest things and i just want to hug them all.

This game is amazing, a load of fun and very competitive with friends, unfortunately no multiplayer on it.Would love for more Fluffies in the future with different abilities. Also Fluffies you can unlock by doing certain challenges and other stuff. You can also create a level mode where you have challenging levels to complete for coins or Fluffies, and one last thing, you all should have a head to head mode to see who can last the longest going against each other. Those are just some suggestions that I think would make the game even better than it already is.

I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

comments: Awesome fun game and I'm doing real science not just chasing fictional characters. I am loving finding new critters and learning about them. Can't wait to get the local Coastcare members and kids around here involved.
Great way to get out doors and helps to now the Wildlife around you.
Great game. Serving two purposes. Collecting really important data about flora and fauna and secondly  providing loads of entertainment

This is a dream come true - there is a game structure for kids, but what it boils down to is that you can upload pix of insects birds plants animals and people will tell you what they are! If you id yourself they tell you if you are right or wrong. At the same time you are contributing to citizen science. Very speedy and responsive for my part of the world - not sure how well known it is elsewhere. Tip: bc pix location is tagged and published w your username, recommended to use a pseudonym esp if putting kids in. Hours of joy.

Its an awesome way to get out and discover the wildlife around you. The only downside is because it uses real people to assess sometimes you can wait a long time to get feedback on your findings. This doesn't interfere with uploading more critters so thats good but in a world of instant everything you gotta be ok with waiting. Still its awesome.
An absolutly brillant game. Enjoyable for the whole family while contributing to something worth while
description: Experience the adventure of real outdoor quests - for real wildlife!QuestaGame takes you outdoors - to your backyard, a local park, a hiking trail, anywhere - for you to discover, learn about, and help monitor biodiversity. Join quests and compete with other players to photograph animals and plants in the wild and ultimately help create a sustainable future.  The game includes all species in your country, using national and global databases. As part of the game, you will join quests, earn gold, buy equipment, gain levels, challenge other players, move up the leader board and become one of the great adventurers of all time. As you move up the levels, the more fun and interesting the game becomes. All sightings are geo-tagged with location, date, time and are easily shared with national and global databases - so you can not only map your conquests, but also help scientists, researchers, planners and others work to protect Australia's biodiversity while you play.For more information be sure to visit http://www.questagame.com.
descriptionHTML:
Experience the adventure of real outdoor quests - for real wildlife!

QuestaGame takes you outdoors - to your backyard, a local park, a hiking trail, anywhere - for you to discover, learn about, and help monitor biodiversity. Join quests and compete with other players to photograph animals and plants in the wild and ultimately help create a sustainable future.

The game includes all species in your country, using national and global databases.

As part of the game, you will join quests, earn gold, buy equipment, gain levels, challenge other players, move up the leader board and become one of the great adventurers of all time. As you move up the levels, the more fun and interesting the game becomes.

All sightings are geo-tagged with location, date, time and are easily shared with national and global databases - so you can not only map your conquests, but also help scientists, researchers, planners and others work to protect Australia's biodiversity while you play.

For more information be sure to visit http://www.questagame.com.

comments: Pros: funny animations, charming stylized set and character designs. Nice to see Teddie, the bartender and beta Angela. I have yet to meet the other chatacters from the tv series. Comfortable gameplay, not a time hog. Cons: 40gems for an additional host slot in diagnostics was for the que, not simultaneous diagnostic host tests. Game could only be played online. Completing 2 Escalante training sessions don't always get rewarded in daily tasks.

The 30 host cap immediately becomes pretty difficult to work around, especially when you need to have duplicates of the  hosts to increase their max level cap/attribute score as well as duplicates of hosts for hat colours. I'm hoping there's a way to increase this later in the game. Also, synthblood is incredibly difficult to obtain especially when you need more to fix higher level hosts. Overall though, the game is pretty generous with currency, so I don't think I've ever ran into a hard building wall that made me think I had to spend money on it to progress further. So far, I'm enjoying the game and looking forward to the updates
The host cap of just 30 is a real problem because it becomes difficult to rank up higher level hosts. I would love to continue playing but the cap is a dealbreaker. Hope you can fix this asap

Pros: 1. Good design and SFX 2. Balanced currency and gameplay 3. Detailed and reasonably complex  Cons: 1. Unnecessary level cap (level 25). I noticed that after reaching level 25, no additional exp is received for doing stuff.  I hope this level cap is removed, as there are still Escalante missions that require level 30, 35,..., 50 to take part in.  I feel like I am wasting my time and effort by catering on hosts when my supposed XP for those actions are neglected simply because the limit is at level 25 right now, when it should be at 50.  Please fix this, I really like playing this game. But because of this premature level capping, I'm afraid this would significantly lessen my motivation in playing and spending on the game. Thanks.
Great pre release! Join us at the subreddit /r/westworldgame to talk strategies and have fun :)
Great game and pretty entertaining.

comments: Amazing! I love it but I absolutely HATE that you only get 1 key every 2 hours. And once you get 2 keys it stops giving you them. I love the freshman and I'm on chapter 11 but it will take me ages to finish all of them as the lack of keys you give. I think it should be 2 keys every 1 hour and the keys come non-stop. I will change my review to a 5 star if you consider and use some of these suggestions. Thank You.

I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I know you guys wont but I've been playing this game a ton and for a long time. i restart everything because when you guys make new stories it makes me want to use diamonds but I don't have anymore. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

I absolutely adore this app. I'm addicted to it. Im not that bothered that it takes two hours to get one key because it gives you time to do other things like go outside and have fun. And besides you can easily just start a different series. The first chapter of each book doesn't cost anything. I don't really like the fact that once you have got two keys it stops giving you them. I am on the sophomore book one chapter nine. It's really exciting so far. I think this app is a really good influence on kids to get them into reading. Overall I LOVE THIS APP!!!!!!!

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

Ok, so unless there is a secret version of this game that I don't have, your ads are misleading. I see ads about stories that don't exist in this app like the one where the girl is pregnant or the "blood bound" one. Please have what you say you have. Also diamonds are bloody expensive, seriously! How long is it going to take before you fix the no. 1 complaint? And one diamond per chapter? That's cheap. The stories are well written and intriguing but the cons outweigh the pros. I'm reducing my rating.

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we‚Äôve created our best work to date. We hope you‚Äôll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team

description: Deciding how to randomize students in a class is not that easy! All students want to do is hang with their friends, and that's not good for students as they don't interact with any new colleagues.Don't worry, Eco Tag is here to help! Just get students to download Eco Tag (it's free!), print out these augmented reality tags (https://arludo.com/tags/ecotag.pdf), give each student one tag and let the students figure it out!Students will need to scan their own tag to find out which ecosystem they're in and will then need to find the students that belong in their ecosystem.It's a fun way for students to break the ice and create a group if they've never met. Along with having fun and meeting their classmates, students also learn about ecosystems and how different organisms interact. Don't believe us? then download Eco Tag and give it a try!By using all the tags, you can accommodate a class of 30 students and put them in a group of 6 students each (that's five groups!) Need more? Then print out some more tags and add some doubles.Want a group of 3? Then let them find their group of 6 and ask students to group themselves by producers and consumers.Want a group of four? Hand out four tags from each ecosystem and then ask students to guess which organisms are missing and see if they can find their matches in the leftover tags.Eco Tag is a flexible app that allows students to have fun creating a group while learning a little about ecosystems.keywords: Eco Tag, ecosystem, producer, primary consumer, secondary consumer
descriptionHTML:
Deciding how to randomize students in a class is not that easy! All students want to do is hang with their friends, and that's not good for students as they don't interact with any new colleagues.

Don't worry, Eco Tag is here to help!
Just get students to download Eco Tag (it's free!), print out these augmented reality tags (https://arludo.com/tags/ecotag.pdf), give each student one tag and let the students figure it out!

Students will need to scan their own tag to find out which ecosystem they're in and will then need to find the students that belong in their ecosystem.

It's a fun way for students to break the ice and create a group if they've never met. Along with having fun and meeting their classmates, students also learn about ecosystems and how different organisms interact.

Don't believe us? then download Eco Tag and give it a try!

By using all the tags, you can accommodate a class of 30 students and put them in a group of 6 students each (that's five groups!) Need more? Then print out some more tags and add some doubles.

Want a group of 3? Then let them find their group of 6 and ask students to group themselves by producers and consumers.

Want a group of four? Hand out four tags from each ecosystem and then ask students to guess which organisms are missing and see if they can find their matches in the leftover tags.

Eco Tag is a flexible app that allows students to have fun creating a group while learning a little about ecosystems.

keywords: Eco Tag, ecosystem, producer, primary consumer, secondary consumer
summary: Eco Tag - Helping teachers separate students into groups since 2017
title: Eco Tag

One day, super boy found an ancient map in the warehouse of his grandfather, it leads to the super jungle world.

Super boy will have to jump and run over obstacles, fight against bees, snakes, snails and a lot of other monsters in dangerous jungle, climb up huge stairs and mountains, and explore a lot of jungle, castle - adventure world .

description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
developerAddress: 1201 Orange street, suite 600, Wilmington DE, USA

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

Good concept, but wont really teach you anything about coding. Lacks the ability to change anything once a loop is initiated, aside from resetting all your work. Game is also very short and puzzles tend to vary from hard to easy and back again with little reason. There is also a lack of a hint option for anyone who is stuck. Game has potential, but seems more like an early beta release.

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Great puzzle game. Good for introducing programming concepts in a fun way. Suggested improvements: A way to break out of infinite loop without losing work. Also noticed that steps cannot be edited after pressing stop part way through simulation. Hats off to the devs overall. I'm looking forward to future puzzles.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.

comments: Its a great game but you should add upgradeable parts, and be able to build an engine from scratch. Another thing add more things to do to the body like tires and maybe interiors. Please put this in your next update I will do an even better review. Let me what you think about these ideas.

I really loved this game! But I made an in app purchase, paid the money but the game didn't acknowledge the purchase, took the money but didn't give me the gold! Emailed to resolve but got no response. Very disappointed.

Can't remove parts on the car that you get right after the tutorial car. If it wasn't for this issue I can see where the dev is going and could be a great time passer. Shame it's broke as soon as it starts.

Great game! Has a lot of potential. Very good for explaining and learning the basic concepts of car repair. Has an expanded break down of all parts which shows you a great diagram of how parts are put together. Only app I have found in the app store that goes into detail!

This is a homerun!!! It's not too complicated that it discourages continuous play but some parts are complicated enough to keep you engaged. I'd like to see more car models soon. But this is hours of fun right now!

Liked the look of it, got past the first intro bit where u fix the first car and it shows u how to get the next car but then when I go to tap and hold on a engine part to get rid of it it doesn't let me it just stays normal or rotates the camera, so couldn't play any further, so can't give a fair review unfortunately as I couldn't experience it properly

comments: Easy to play.  Very addictive.  Game moves as fast, or as slow, as you do; the pace adapts well for both casual and serious players.  You can play on both your desktop and mobile interchangeably with the same account!  Developers are very much a part of the community; constantly improving the game and running in-game events.  While there are in-app purchases I never feel pressured... I spent a few $ because I wanted to support the game as I've been enjoying it throughly.

This is a great game. I have played it for over 2 years now and it's still my favorite game. Advice to newbies, take your time. Stay in one age and build up your resources before moving on. You can play in multiple worlds, join guilds, make friends and they have great quests to do if you choose to.

Game is amazing me and my partner have been playing it for years and it has connected us in such a real way. Thank you for the amazing forge experience. I just deleted my reindeer from christmas event by accident and if i could somehow get it back plz help with any way possible thank you

This is a wonderful game, great effect and a wonderful story line. My only issue is logging in. I keep getting a message saying my internet connection is not working, yet with no internet connection I would not even get to the sign in page. Please fix this issue or I am done.

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. Unfortunatly the problem seem to become worse, I would not spend money on this game, too shaky account control. Will uninstall it now and go shopping for something more reliable. A shame as the game itself is really neat.
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
