description: Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!Featuring:‚Ä¢ Exploration of an ancient civilization‚Ä¢ Crafting and creative building‚Ä¢ Tribal life simulation games‚Ä¢ Exotic materials to mine‚Ä¢ Lots of free craft items to play with‚Ä¢ Amazing blocky graphics‚Ä¢ Animal pets to play withOne of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
descriptionHTML:
Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!

Featuring:
• Exploration of an ancient civilization
• Crafting and creative building
• Tribal life simulation games
• Exotic materials to mine
• Lots of free craft items to play with
• Amazing blocky graphics
• Animal pets to play with

One of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.

This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.

There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?

Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Creative crafting and exploration! Mine blocks, craft an Aztec city by hand!
title: Aztec Craft: Ancient Blocky City Building Games 3D

comments: A good concept that needs some work.   The good.   The puzzles gradually ramp up the difficulty.   The visuals and sound are very good for the app.   Some requests   An ad free one time paid version would be nice  The game needs some tool tips. Like if you click on a object in the game. It should tell you some stats. Like power capacity and power requirements.   How about an in game Twitter and or email contact link.   Can power lines please be able to spit off into 2 different directions  The only bad  Too many ads and the ads are too long 30+ seconds.

Won't let me play 1st level. The screen shows what i think is a pause menu over the game. The screen says start but it will never start no matter where you press non of the buttons work. Game sucks. I dont know how it plays because it wont let me play. Dont install this app its bugged

Lovely little game. Starts out easy showing you the controls/events, but quickly ramps up the puzzle. Speech bubbles get in the way of putting lines down and cause you to lose because you only had 30s to complete the level. Adding an option for a topdown view would solve this because then you could actually see all the directions instead of only 2-3 at a time. Oh and the ads suck. Can we buy a version without them?

What the game is this....everything in the game matters...the no of poles which decides the resistance...the current flow in it indicating potential difference...3 lines conduct more than 2 and single lines...the hurricanes and disconnections indicate open circuit.... I'm an electrical student...finally finished the game...this game is fantastic...just need one more such game from STATNETT...thank you for this game....the other app ohm is also good...plzz develop one more such game!!!!!!!! THE FUTURE IS DEFINITELY ELECTRIC!!!

Creating lines maneuvering needs improvement. It's hard, I have to zoom in just to get it right. But over all, it's a nice game. Now, I get to understand the complexity. Often times, we in our area simply complain about brownouts without knowing the critical planning and action being done in the background. Kudos!
Opened to just a black screen that played music. Absolutely no indication that anything was happening. My screen might as well have been locked, except I could still swipe in the notification bar
description: Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about: - Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use? - Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded? - Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game. Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
descriptionHTML:
Without electricity there is chaos. Balance is a free puzzle game about electricity and power grids. Your goal is to make sure there are no blackouts, that the power grids are functional, and that you always produce the right amount of power.

The game offers many challenges you probably never thought about:
- Did you know that the amount of power produced is changed all day and night to match the amount we use?
- Did you know that there is a limit on how much power you can transmit through a single power line without it getting overloaded?
- Did you know that an well-built power grid could have any one line disconnected without causing blackouts?
You do not need any knowledge about electricity or power grids in order to enjoy this game.

Balance is developed by Statnett, the system operator in the Norwegian energy system, and is based on real challenges they work with every day.
recentChanges: Fixed a few bugs and breaking issues with some of the levels.
summary: Balance is a puzzle game where you build and maintain the power grid.
title: Balance

description: Best free crafting game in 2017. Build epic structures using blueprints and explore a huge blocky world! Craft your own home or even a city if you dare to dream so big!Fun game for boys and girls. Build and decorate your own dream house in a beautiful city. This kind of house building & construction games 3D will blow your mind! Your creativity will be unstoppable and the possibilities endless. The whole world will be your own building sandbox game! There is no need to care about dangers present in the survival mode when you're doing your craft - exploration. description: Everybody has one day dreamed of creating his own video game. It's now possible with Draw Your Game! All you need is paper, pens, and our app! It's super easy!Why not get the app now and read these simple instructions during the download?1. Draw your own game's world on a piece of paper, using black, blue, green and red pens.2. Use the Draw Your Game app to take a picture of your drawing.3. Wait a few seconds, while Draw Your Game transforms the drawing into an amazing game !4. Play your brand new game, with a cute character that you can control. 5. Share your creation with other Draw Your Game players from all around the world. Of course we check them to be sure there's no inappropriate content!How do I play?In Draw Your Game, there are three modes you can play!‚ñ∂ Create: this is where you build your own world with paper and pens! You can also draw inside the game, so you can create on the go.‚ñ∂ Explore: play the levels of drawers from all around the world. Some of them are easy. Some others are complex and very hard. You choose whatever you want to play!‚ñ∂ Adventure: play through a hundred levels picked by our team of dreamers. Follow unlockable characters through their journey into a world of paper.There are two kinds of levels:‚ñ∂ Escape: the character must find a way off the paper to escape and finish the level. Sometimes it requires some clever mind tricks!‚ñ∂ Destruction: the character must push blue objects into red ones to destroy them. It's not as easy as you may think!The game is FREE (with ads)‚ñ∂ For free, you can finished the game and unlock all features if you play in the adventure mode.‚ñ∂ You earn a sticker each time you finish a level and you unlock a feature when you finish a season.‚ñ∂ You need to wait 2 hours between each season unlocked.‚ñ∂ There is a video ad every 5 minutes.If you don't want to wait or don't want to play in adventure mode, you can do a purchase to unlock features:‚ñ∂ One by one if you want to consume your stickers.‚ñ∂ You can buy the "Full Version" (in-app purchase) to unlock all at once.‚ñ∂ A special offer is available for the "Full Version" the first 24h (30%).So what are these pens for?You can pick between four colors to draw a world:‚ñ∂ Black for stationary floors/ground (basically, platforms)‚ñ∂ Blue for movable objects that the character can push around (we love physics)‚ñ∂ Green for bouncing elements (sounds like fun)‚ñ∂ Red for elements that will destroy the character or the blue objects (don't touch them!)Here are some advices from our artists‚ñ∂ Use fairly wide felt-tip pens.‚ñ∂ Choose vivid colors.‚ñ∂ Take pictures under good lighting.Important noticeOur team approves each new world before releasing it to the community, and a rating system is used to rank the top worlds against one another. We spend an epic amount of time to ensure that your children (and ours as well) won't see inappropriate content in the game. Of course, if you think we've missed some things, there are ways inside the game to report us anything you want.Some limitations we're aware ofDraw Your Game only runs on smartphones and tablets with a camera that can be used to scan your drawings.Want to share you creations with us?We're always amazed by your creations. We validate every level, but if you want to get some love and feedback about your world, share it with us on Twitter (@DrawYourGame) or Facebook! You can also send us your feature suggestions!
descriptionHTML:
Everybody has one day dreamed of creating his own video game. It's now possible with Draw Your Game! All you need is paper, pens, and our app! It's super easy!


Why not get the app now and read these simple instructions during the download?
1. Draw your own game's world on a piece of paper, using black, blue, green and red pens.
2. Use the Draw Your Game app to take a picture of your drawing.
3. Wait a few seconds, while Draw Your Game transforms the drawing into an amazing game !
4. Play your brand new game, with a cute character that you can control.
5. Share your creation with other Draw Your Game players from all around the world. Of course we check them to be sure there's no inappropriate content!

How do I play?
In Draw Your Game, there are three modes you can play!

▶ Create: this is where you build your own world with paper and pens! You can also draw inside the game, so you can create on the go.
▶ Explore: play the levels of drawers from all around the world. Some of them are easy. Some others are complex and very hard. You choose whatever you want to play!
▶ Adventure: play through a hundred levels picked by our team of dreamers. Follow unlockable characters through their journey into a world of paper.

There are two kinds of levels:
▶ Escape: the character must find a way off the paper to escape and finish the level. Sometimes it requires some clever mind tricks!
▶ Destruction: the character must push blue objects into red ones to destroy them. It's not as easy as you may think!

The game is FREE (with ads)

▶ For free, you can finished the game and unlock all features if you play in the adventure mode.
▶ You earn a sticker each time you finish a level and you unlock a feature when you finish a season.
▶ You need to wait 2 hours between each season unlocked.
▶ There is a video ad every 5 minutes.

If you don't want to wait or don't want to play in adventure mode, you can do a purchase to unlock features:
▶ One by one if you want to consume your stickers.
▶ You can buy the "Full Version" (in-app purchase) to unlock all at once.
▶ A special offer is available for the "Full Version" the first 24h (30%).

So what are these pens for?

You can pick between four colors to draw a world:
▶ Black for stationary floors/ground (basically, platforms)
▶ Blue for movable objects that the character can push around (we love physics)
▶ Green for bouncing elements (sounds like fun)
▶ Red for elements that will destroy the character or the blue objects (don't touch them!)

Here are some advices from our artists

▶ Use fairly wide felt-tip pens.
▶ Choose vivid colors.
▶ Take pictures under good lighting.

Important notice
Our team approves each new world before releasing it to the community, and a rating system is used to rank the top worlds against one another. We spend an epic amount of time to ensure that your children (and ours as well) won't see inappropriate content in the game.
Of course, if you think we've missed some things, there are ways inside the game to report us anything you want.

Some limitations we're aware of
Draw Your Game only runs on smartphones and tablets with a camera that can be used to scan your drawings.

Want to share you creations with us?
We're always amazed by your creations. We validate every level, but if you want to get some love and feedback about your world, share it with us on Twitter (@DrawYourGame) or Facebook! You can also send us your feature suggestions!

comments: Amazing and a unique type of game. The currency is all obtainable even as a free to play. Cool looking dragons and the movement in the game more lively than just pictures. I've played many app before this and I would say that this is top 1 so far. The only problem is the game will stop and crash. I don't know the reason but I've tried in another device and also stops working. Overall the game is magnificent and I definitely recommend it to everyone!

I love this game. The game gives you a lot of things to do and side quests among the story line quest which I like. They are very fair with diamond drops and their heroic and legendary drop rates are great in my opinion. Only real concern is the all caps in chat and the amount you can type. The interface is a bit crowded but everything works well. Great game developers! :)

Awesome! I really like the game. Top 5 game? Worth it! I've played some similar game but this one is the best. The graphic is great and the dragons are cute. The resources are not too hard to get. The best part is the drag-skill! It's really different. Each dragon have their skill effect with different area form. You have to drag it right. A long way to be a master tamer. So enjoy the process!

I Tried this game with fair expectations, and even as I started i thought it might not be as fun as some other ones I've tried. But this game legitimately blew my standards away! It looks great, latency is great, gameplay is great! It's just a great game. Characters have simple tropes but are written in a likable way, which can't be said for alot of games. Everything about this game is very approachable and fun, and not to mention really nice to look at. I'm a fan for sure!

Pretty well made game afterall, all currency ingame can be obtained in fairly free and quick way. The game also offers really big help/supply for newbies. Spend a few (for me 3)days and you can already get 3 times of 11 advanced draw. Can get a little bit of grindy but not pay to win either. The flaws being some English translation error and extreme flashy visual effects, and the lack of (limited even) variety of the dragons and campaign plot.

Good games guys but the summon rate for a 5 star is too low. Im one of the top players on the server. When i do get a 5 star its one that i already have. Also the log in event is not working for the American server. Even if you pay. Its a waste cuz rates are too low. So don't

comments: This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

A lot of frame rate issues. Lost many runs because controls become unresponsive while gameplay continued. Ads are incredible intrusive. That said, it can be really fun if they cleaned up the coding on this simple game.

This is a cool little game, fun and easy. The music is great. Would have been 5 stars if I didn't have to pay for the game to run smooth (no ads). Also had a very annoying reset issue after paying to remove ads.

Fun game. Cool to add Assassin's Creed stuff. I am a fan of AC so playing as a tiny Assassin is cute and fun. Challenging and frustrating at the sane time, but enjoyable. However...I am curious as to the Assassin selection. They added non popular Assassins like Evie/Jacob...and side characters such as Adewale. No Edward? No Connor? What gives? I'd trade all three of those nobodies for Connor lol.

For some reason every time I exit the game it always resets and goes back to zero and I lose everything I have. I purchased no in game ads and I don't know if that is the case but I would like this to be fixed. This is a very fun game but I don't want to have to play it over and over to keep unlocking things.

Horrible optimization due to ads. When I open the game with my wifi off it works fine. As soon as I turn on the wifi and the game stars fetching ads the whole gameplay becomes laggy and slow. It's not even in a state of being called free to play. x(

Downloaded the Holiday Edition, also and played it one Christmas. Very fun game, overall. I really miss the mPoints feature. I wish you could have given us a heads up before doing away with it. One last thing I would like to add, please keep adding new items to throw at the Jerk. All in all, keep up the good work!

comments: =u= Well it makes drawing the female body a lot more fun than using the standard wooden puppet. Graphics are pretty good and the gameplay runs fairly smooth even though I'm on an old device. I do hope the "ad fail" glitch stops because 100 per ad isnt a bad deal. Skin color would be nice to change. A few more hairstyles would be nice. And maybe even a breast sizer. Some people like it flat, and vice versa. Still a great app that I hope gets more updates.

I love this app but there is also a little spot needed to improve, i have problem about moving camera in 3d space. It fixed to rotate only character's origin which is working fine but then i rotate or move character away from that pin point, camera can't follow focus to where the actual character is.

I honestly love this game. But there's only one problem. I wish there were more clothing options,   shoes, etc. Also I wish there were more dances. Other than that this is a really nice and fun game!

i really like this app, however there are a few problems i have with it. other than watching 5 ads a day there's literally no other way to get diamonds for free, and if you're not the kind or person to make in-app purchases it can make getting diamonds quickly very difficult. it can really limit the freedom we have with the character. also, especially with long hair and sleeves, some of the models are very glitchy. either sleeves go into the arm, hair cuts straight through the body, or legs cut through shirts. i'm not exactly sure how you can fix this, since i'm just starting to learn about rigging 3d models, but i'd just experiment until you find something that works. all in all, great app, just a few small issues that shouldn't impede on the experience too much.

description: Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses >LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuffCustomize a horse!You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making
descriptionHTML:
This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns.

Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.

description: Superbru is a free social fantasy and predictor sports platform. It's a fun, competitive game for casual and fanatical sports fans alike, with prediction and fantasy games in Rugby, Soccer, American Football, Cricket, Golf, Motorsport, Cycling and more. Check the live scores for the latest know results. Challenge your friends and colleagues in private pools - and beat them!We've got three exciting game models for various sporting tournaments throughout the year, our Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars games:Predictor (also referred to as Tipping):Our original game which always proves challenging, no matter how long you‚Äôve been playing. Predict the winners and score margins for every fixture in that tournament. You‚Äôll be rewarded with points for your prediction accuracy according to our tried and tested scoring system, which will rank you against your friends in the pools you compete in and the rest of the SuperBru community. This will keep you watching the match right to the dying seconds as you hope and pray for a last minute score to get the Margin Point in your favor. Fantasy:Select a squad of players and a starting line-up for each round in the tournament and earn fantasy points based on how well your team of players performs in their real life fixtures. Plan your team carefully and make some shrewd transfers each round to capitalize on the next round‚Äôs matches to sneak ahead of your friends. We've got Fantasy games for various major tournaments for both Rugby (Union) and Soccer (Football). Superstars:Our Superstars games are designed to be somewhere between a predictor game and a fantasy game - it only takes a couple of minutes each week to make Superstars picks, there are no transfers to make or team limits to worry about, but it still offers the fun of following players as well as just match results.We‚Äôve recently launched the following games for the 2017 season:Super Rugby Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars gamesFormula 1MotoGPAustralian Football League (AFL)National Rugby League (NRL)Major League Soccer (MLS)The US Open 2017 Golf Superstars Currie Cup Premier DivisionIndian Premier League Cricket T20 (IPL 2017) Predictor and Superstar gamesGiro d'ItaliaTour de FranceVuelta a EspanaNatwest T20 Blast PredictorRugby League State of OriginJunior World Championship RugbyThe Rugby Championship Predictor, Fantasy and SuperstarsCaribbean Premier League T20English Championship FootballScottish Premier League FootballWomen's Rugby World CupPGA Championship Golf SuperstarsEnglish Premier League 2017/18 Predictor, Fantasy and SuperstarsMitre 10 Cup RugbyAviva Premiership RugbyLa LigaBundesligaTest Cricket SuperstarsTop 14 French RugbyTop League Japanese RugbyOther tournaments to be launched soon include:NFL 2017Australian National Rugby ChampionshipA-League SoccerThe US Open TennisWorld Sevens Rugby SeriesPremier Soccer Leagueand many more to come throughout the year.Keep track of live scores with our clever crowd sourced live scoring tool. If you're watching the game, why not join in the live scoring contribution as well to keep your fellow Brus up to date - we'll list you as one of the contributors to acknowledge your efforts during the match. So there you have it - however you want to play SuperBru, we hope there's something for everyone. Good luck for the season ahead!
descriptionHTML:
Superbru is a free social fantasy and predictor sports platform. It's a fun, competitive game for casual and fanatical sports fans alike, with prediction and fantasy games in Rugby, Soccer, American Football, Cricket, Golf, Motorsport, Cycling and more. Check the live scores for the latest know results. Challenge your friends and colleagues in private pools - and beat them!

We've got three exciting game models for various sporting tournaments throughout the year, our Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars games:

Predictor (also referred to as Tipping):
Our original game which always proves challenging, no matter how long you’ve been playing. Predict the winners and score margins for every fixture in that tournament. You’ll be rewarded with points for your prediction accuracy according to our tried and tested scoring system, which will rank you against your friends in the pools you compete in and the rest of the SuperBru community.

This will keep you watching the match right to the dying seconds as you hope and pray for a last minute score to get the Margin Point in your favor.

Fantasy:
Select a squad of players and a starting line-up for each round in the tournament and earn fantasy points based on how well your team of players performs in their real life fixtures. Plan your team carefully and make some shrewd transfers each round to capitalize on the next round’s matches to sneak ahead of your friends.

We've got Fantasy games for various major tournaments for both Rugby (Union) and Soccer (Football).

Superstars:
Our Superstars games are designed to be somewhere between a predictor game and a fantasy game - it only takes a couple of minutes each week to make Superstars picks, there are no transfers to make or team limits to worry about, but it still offers the fun of following players as well as just match results.

We’ve recently launched the following games for the 2017 season:

Super Rugby Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars games
Formula 1
MotoGP
Australian Football League (AFL)
National Rugby League (NRL)
Major League Soccer (MLS)
The US Open 2017 Golf Superstars
Currie Cup Premier Division
Indian Premier League Cricket T20 (IPL 2017) Predictor and Superstar games
Giro d'Italia
Tour de France
Vuelta a Espana
Natwest T20 Blast Predictor
Rugby League State of Origin
Junior World Championship Rugby
The Rugby Championship Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars
Caribbean Premier League T20
English Championship Football
Scottish Premier League Football
Women's Rugby World Cup
PGA Championship Golf Superstars
English Premier League 2017/18 Predictor, Fantasy and Superstars
Mitre 10 Cup Rugby
Aviva Premiership Rugby
La Liga
Bundesliga
Test Cricket Superstars
Top 14 French Rugby
Top League Japanese Rugby


Other tournaments to be launched soon include:

NFL 2017
Australian National Rugby Championship
A-League Soccer
The US Open Tennis
World Sevens Rugby Series
Premier Soccer League
and many more to come throughout the year.

Keep track of live scores with our clever crowd sourced live scoring tool. If you're watching the game, why not join in the live scoring contribution as well to keep your fellow Brus up to date - we'll list you as one of the contributors to acknowledge your efforts during the match.

So there you have it - however you want to play SuperBru, we hope there's something for everyone. Good luck for the season ahead!

description: Dots Sync is a modern transport-puzzle. Move a synchronized Dots sliding in various directions with a levels of progressive difficulty that will make you think in the solutions.Enjoy an new design with simple and addictive gameplay, without ADs, microtransactions or ranking of scores.GamePlay: move a synchronized green and red colors Dots across the rails as stopping the movement on the nodes to activate all Goals.There are many progressive obstacles that will make ever more challenging puzzles:> Most varied lines directions, straight, inclined and circular.>Keys: Unlock blocked lines to solve challenges.> Push Button: Unlock paths after the Dot is over it.> Bomb: Clears the goals already won after the blast.> Lock: Hold the Dot, but can free it through the unlock platform.> Teleport: Send the Dot to the starting position.
descriptionHTML:
Dots Sync is a modern transport-puzzle. Move a synchronized Dots sliding in various directions with a levels of progressive difficulty that will make you think in the solutions.

Enjoy an new design with simple and addictive gameplay, without ADs, microtransactions or ranking of scores.

GamePlay: move a synchronized green and red colors Dots across the rails as stopping the movement on the nodes to activate all Goals.

There are many progressive obstacles that will make ever more challenging puzzles:

> Most varied lines directions, straight, inclined and circular.

>Keys: Unlock blocked lines to solve challenges.

> Push Button: Unlock paths after the Dot is over it.

> Bomb: Clears the goals already won after the blast.

> Lock: Hold the Dot, but can free it through the unlock platform.

> Teleport: Send the Dot to the starting position.
summary: This a Premium experience that provides concentration training and logical skill
title: Dots Sync - Symmetric brain game

comments: It's an ok app and this is my third time redownloading it, the character designs have gotten better but there only problem I have, the tickets, like really? 2 tickets? First it was 5, then 3, now only 2. Not everyone has money to waste on games, especially tickets, not only that but their overpriced, like any other add on pack/item. I wouldn't even be surprised if I deleted this and redownloaded back in a year and they only give you one ticket a day.

Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

It is nice that they let the readers write their own stories.  Many of the stories written by readers are more interesting than what Episode offers... The game takes too long to load when I open it and also when it loads a story.  Then you have to sit through at least two ads just to play the story. They need to let authors be able to delete their stories.  That would probably help on the loading time. Maybe if an author wants to delete their story, they have to explain why.  Then the story could be pending deletion (and have a note for readers) until Episode decides to accept or decline.

I LOVE THIS! But, just a thing, you could like ask on every episode (that the app creators make) like 'what's your gender and preference to date' because all the creator made ones at like just girls, and I know males play as well. Not hating AT ALL,I LOVE this app SO MUCH! Just tryna help ya improve! Luv you episode! (Or make more that are inclusive of gender) MEOW LOVE U

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

I love love love this game! Its really awesome to see the creativity and beauty in an interactive game. There are some things I would love to request; hairstyles. Yes there are lots and that's really awesome but if you could customize both the bangs of the hairstyle AND the back hairstyle. A more diverse set of actions and hand held items. Also, body types. I am a thin girl but it would be a whole lot more to stories if there were curvy girls and not totally buff guys. Speaking of males, male looks to me are more limited than female. Only in special stories are there more diverse male looks. Facial features such as freckles, or scars, moles, and other facial markings would be much appreciated. Gosh this is a lot but I really hope these can be added for a more realistic game play. I love the game and I hope this is seen and added in updates to come

Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3

Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

comments: Why is it that when you add new levels, I get kicked back to the first round in the legends arena? Totally unfair that all the progress I've made gets completely erased. Now that this has happened for about the 3rd time, it makes me want to uninstall

Seems like they took away the tree house and treasure map for this legend thing. It's nice to have extra levels to play while waiting for new levels, but I liked the side challenges too. It's basically impossible to earn gold now.

Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. Of course, I suppose that's by design so I spend money. Which I won't do. I just want some "bubblegum" to past the time.  Now, it's making my blood pressure rise...  Also amazing how many 5 ‚≠ê ratings they get in one day without the user giving explanations on why. Seems suspicious...  Oh, how I hate the legends arena stages...

Love this game! Fun, addictive, challenging. I only wish lives weren't limited. I hate getting stuck on a level for days or even weeks because you only get 5 lives at a time... unless you want to buy more with cash :(
Love it. Addicting. Some levels were hard but by taking a break I'd usually get it when I went back to play or have my sister beat the level for me
Use to love this game. But once you get up in level 1500's, you're forced to play in an "arena" for 12 days. And when it ends, you have to update app. Pretty disappointing.

descriptionHTML:
THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME WITH UNIQUE MAGIC POWERS AND BOOSTS!

♥ Join the fun world of Amy and help collect her precious toys! ♥

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Discover Amy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest toys that will drag you to Amy’s enjoyable world. Crunch all the same colored cubes by using various boosters such as brick-busting blasts, rechargeable power-ups and many more!

● COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY

comments: You deserve 4-5 stars but you need to solve some issues first: 1: crashing into grass?...really? And I didn't even touched it.  2: I want the car to stay straight and the entire map to rotate according to my driving direction. Just like I would be in the car.  3: Make the area of the buttons larger to have a more accurate driving.  4: I would like, when I'm driving, the entire screen to zoom in a little to be able to drive through narrow spaces more quickly.  Give me the satisfaction of playing and I'll give you your 5 stars on all categories.
Annoying because the cars dont brake or stop so if there are two cars coming in opposing directions, there is no way to pass! Don't bother wasting your storage on this game!
It's just idiotic! And annoying! I can't explain why it just don't try it for yourself trust me you'll hate it I'm sure like every other reviewer.

The ads are incredibly annoying but only because they last far too long. They're not all that frequent so it's not so bad. I really enjoy the simplicity of the game, a lot of these parking games are 3d now and I don't much care for it. I'm ok with the controls but a little wheel might be better. It's pretty fair overall and the difficulty curve is pretty good for me as I have a short attention span. Amendment: after level 30, the game changes into trying to navigate heavy traffic in a car with no acceleration whatsoever. Not fun at all especially as the car you're driving is clearly a 458.
Everything was fine except for the controlls,not only were the petals terrible but also the steering wheel wuz not easy to control.For users of this app similar to me I would not recommend
It had to many ads, and u wouldn't even hit the car and u have to restart it is terrible

descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras

comments: Game is great had fun and provided an  emmersive experience. As a lover of the Caf√© Racer culture it's nice to have a game that appeals to this specific group. My only complaint would be that I wished that there was more variety in terms of different modes. For example: Online where you can race and see other people's Caf√© Racers  and race against each other or just a AI race mode. Overall a very entertaining free game and I highly recommend it to any motorcycle lovers.

As a motorcycle rider and enthusiast I can honestly say in my expert opinion that this game is the most realistic riding physics game I have played yet. The graphics are really cool and the possibilities seem endless when it comes to customizing the bikes. And I grew up with cafe racer style bikes and this game really hits the nail on the head. I want to make a suggestion to the people who made the game though. Mabey put in some racing levels or an online mode where you can race with fellow players of the game and see what other people have done with their bikes. It would make it more fun and interesting. Other than that, it's really awesome!

This game is really fun and addicting, I play it every time I get the chance since I don't enjoy many mobile games. This one is just a fun chill game where you ride around on a Cafe bike weaving in an out of traffic. I just wish there were more secrets or other things you could do in the game. Maybe like more hidden paths, customize  your character, more bikes, and more maps that aren't super expensive to unlock. Overall this game is really fun

Dear developer, this game is unique! I swear! I love this game very much, had a different story and gameplay from the other motorcycle game in playstore. But... Can you please update the game? I mean, the mirrors (real function, not flat color), look back option maybe, camera option when riding, photograph my bike wherever i park that thing. And if you guys thinking about to add revsbomb and manual gear, i really appreciate it, i should give you a 5 stars if you guys revise this game to be more fun. Once again, this game is awesome, i like it, thankyou for making a little time killer guys!!!

Best bike game, iiif!  The custom is not just caferacer and scrambler style,  rabbit or raised handlebars would be nice. Also, adjusting ride height would be cool. Gastank shape is sadly limited with the bikes default shape. And make the button position adjustable please... But overall a great game for bike enthusiasts,  free and no pushy adds

Please make the graphics more like real not like cartoon, add some ways in which we can turn and opt some different roads like in metros. Idea is great. I was really impressed with the usage of various day to day words like TV etc. And do make the oil station working. Add an oil meter so that we can fill oils at the oil stations. Also add some sporty bikes and also a working rear view mirrors
description: Endless moto racing in a unique low poly environment with a never before seen degree of customization. No timers, no fuel bars, no limits.Enjoy a realistically portrayed first person experience in a simplified world that lets you focus on what really matters - the multifaceted joys of motorcycling.Ride your motorcycle in one or two way roads, swerve and filter between realistically moving traffic, through cities, country roads and desert environments. All in glorious Low-Poly lack of detail.Pick from a variety of motorcycles, from small 125cc single cylinder bikes to powerfull in line fours, with boxer and in-line two cylinder motorcycles there for your chosing.Customize your motorcycle to your heart's content, changing anything from handlebars and mirrors to exhausts and wheels. And when you are done, paint them in the color combination of your liking - you can even paint the frame!Share your replays to show off your skills, take pictures of your unique customized bikes to show your creativity.Cafe Racer - a different breed of endless racingGAMEPLAY‚Ä¢ Tilt, Slide,Touch and Gamepad control options‚Ä¢ Use up arrow to accelerate and down arrow to brake‚Ä¢ Press the middle edges of the screen to look aroundTIPS‚Ä¢ The faster you ride, the faster your score will rise‚Ä¢ When driving over 100 kmh, close overtakes will yield extra bonus points ‚Ä¢ Three difficulty levels - bigger danger, bigger rewards‚Ä¢ If you can manage it, try to find alternative routes - bonus points await for high speed‚Ä¢ If you hear a horn, try to move aside - a car is behind you, and it might just run you overFOLLOW CAFE RACER‚Ä¢ https://www.facebook.com/caferacergame‚Ä¢ https://twitter.com/CafeRacerGameCafe Racer will be updated regularly with more content and optimizations. descriptionHTML:
Endless moto racing in a unique low poly environment with a never before seen degree of customization. No timers, no fuel bars, no limits.

Enjoy a realistically portrayed first person experience in a simplified world that lets you focus on what really matters - the multifaceted joys of motorcycling.

Ride your motorcycle in one or two way roads, swerve and filter between realistically moving traffic, through cities, country roads and desert environments. All in glorious Low-Poly lack of detail.

Pick from a variety of motorcycles, from small 125cc single cylinder bikes to powerfull in line fours, with boxer and in-line two cylinder motorcycles there for your chosing.

Customize your motorcycle to your heart's content, changing anything from handlebars and mirrors to exhausts and wheels. And when you are done, paint them in the color combination of your liking - you can even paint the frame!

Share your replays to show off your skills, take pictures of your unique customized bikes to show your creativity.

Cafe Racer - a different breed of endless racing


GAMEPLAY
• Tilt, Slide,Touch and Gamepad control options
• Use up arrow to accelerate and down arrow to brake
• Press the middle edges of the screen to look around

TIPS
• The faster you ride, the faster your score will rise
• When driving over 100 kmh, close overtakes will yield extra bonus points
• Three difficulty levels - bigger danger, bigger rewards
• If you can manage it, try to find alternative routes - bonus points await for high speed
• If you hear a horn, try to move aside - a car is behind you, and it might just run you over

FOLLOW CAFE RACER
• https://www.facebook.com/caferacergame
• https://twitter.com/CafeRacerGame


Cafe Racer will be updated regularly with more content and optimizations. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

comments: Brilliant, innovative, addictive game BUT please reduce the number of ads. That's why this game is only averaging  3.5* and why I can only give it 4*. People will stop playing very quickly as it currently is. Just take it down to an ad break every end of run. Also a way to easily view all positions on the leader board would be nice. Otherwise the game itself is great.

I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you

Cool game... if it weren't for all the commercials, maybe I would have kept it on my phone. Perhaps offering themes that can be paid for could relieve your needs for paid ads... Just a helpful hint from Flo-rida.
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

description:
The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!‚Ä¢ Troll famous video games!‚Ä¢ 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!‚Ä¢ Unlock insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Lots of wacky collectibles!‚Ä¢ No Wi-fi needed!‚Ä¢ A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that‚Äôll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber‚Äôs go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It‚Äôs payback time for all those levels you didn‚Äôt complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?

description: In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened. Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain. Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!GAME FEATURES:‚Ä¢ 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!‚Ä¢ Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!‚Ä¢ Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!‚Ä¢ Over 100 different food items! ‚Ä¢ Over 100 trophies to collect! ‚Ä¢ Unlimited play!Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!GAME MODES:‚Ä¢ Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.‚Ä¢ Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!‚Ä¢ Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress.   Customers are infinitely patient.‚Ä¢ Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master?  Put your food-making skills to the test!Available in 11 languages:  English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.
descriptionHTML:
In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened.

Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain.

Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!

GAME FEATURES:
• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!
• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
• Over 100 different food items!
• Over 100 trophies to collect!
• Unlimited play!

Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!

GAME MODES:

• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.

• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!

• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress. Customers are infinitely patient.

• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master? Put your food-making skills to the test!


Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.
developerAddress:
GoBit Games
Suite 149
6523 California Ave SW
Seattle, WA  98136
summary: More fast-paced food-making fun for everyone!
title: Burger Shop 2

description: Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games- elegant dresses and accessories- easy to play, like all our makeup gamesWe hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how  we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !

description: The city is in the state of turmoil. The terrorists, human traffickers and robbers are everywhere around the city. There is no acts of Violence unturned. Civilians are scared. People are praying for a Flying Super Hero who can save them from the antagonist atrocities in this superhero vs Gangster City Battle. Become the real superhero and save the people from these gangsters and become superhero fighting squad. You are in for some really tough kungfu fight fighting games.Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle is a saga of superhero fighting games where you are not some ordinary hero fighter but a kungfu combat 2018 super fighter, action hero. You have the duty of taking revenge from the super villain and put an end to their harmful intentions. If all the superhero, female warrior, female heroine, super fighter and flying superheroes, teams up to form an elite unit of super heroes then definitely you can superkick the Grand Immortal Gods of terrorism and win this arena battle as a king fu fighter. The terrorist mafia is spreading all over the city, they have created a bank robbery crew which did a major crime robbery at Federal Reserve Bank. It was an impossible heist but the mafia made it possible by their evil tactics and plans. Their gritty crime saga is creating terror among the civilians.Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle is the crime fight between the protagonists and the antagonists. You have to become the superhero New York needs at this time of despair. You have to keep on fighting to survive this cyclone of crime and terror. It‚Äôs time to show your love interest for your city. Apart from doing superhero fight in the battlefield you have been also made a street champ. You have been given training of martial arts by the African protagonist, to save the civilians from the street fighting and robbery. Being a fight champion get the chance of some real action fight on the streets of New York City.Being a Flying Action Hero you have the powers of a flying hero to do crime patrol over the city at night as well. When the superhero fly over the city for the protection of civilians then no chance is left for escape crime. Make sure no one is able to do fly hero city escape. The Bank of downtown is under the constant danger of heist. Recently an armored truck full of gold and money was stolen from the city at night. So their next target is to do a bank heist. Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle is the Heroes Battle to eliminate the outlaws and the Town Crime prevailing in the city. This has become a civil war which will end in the battle arena. The battle city is in need of your skills and valor for it becoming a survival city.Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle gives you the chance of becoming the ultimate legend hero in this Gangster Crime Battle. You have to do just what is expected from a New York City superhero. Stop the grand city robbery from happening, Make counter attacks on gangster strike action, make sure there is no escape crime from the cop and end this crime battle by constantly patrolling the Crime City. Be an active part of the superhero fighting squad. There are a number of missions that you have to win to conquer this Grand Superhero Battle. This is a game of Hero Survival.Game FeaturesHigh Quality 3D GraphicsEasy and Smooth controlsUser Interactive gameAdventurous Missions and Various LevelsRealistic Environments

description: Cute baby panda Lu promises new and crazy nanny games for kids and toddlers! Play and explore different rooms in the house, and learn many new things with chubby and sweet baby panda Lu.Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. Follow your virtual friend to the living room and do some fun housework. Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day. Cute baby panda Lu promises new and crazy nanny games for kids and toddlers! Play and explore different rooms in the house, and learn many new things with chubby and sweet baby panda Lu.

Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. Follow your virtual friend to the living room and do some fun housework. Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day.

· Let's get crazy in a safe and interactive baby panda bear world!
· Take care of furry and cute baby panda Lu all day long!

comments: Best car physics I've found on android. In the single-player modes I've tried it runs smoothly on my old Nexus 2012 KitKat tablet. But there's a graphics bug: the asphalt of race tracks (but not city streets) shows as a perfect mirror image of the sky above, clouds and all! I can make rubber marks on it, though.

Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down thoüòÇ Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developersüòäüôè Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

descriptionHTML:
Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.

There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.

There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra, Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.

Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two.

descriptionHTML:
Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.

6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.

description: Construction Machines Transporter Cargo Truck Game is on and out now!Tighten up your seat belt because it's time to have some fun with the gigantic construction machines and heavy trucks. Driving speed cars on multiple city tracks with perfect driving physics is not a difficult job. So let's do some tricky heavy machinery driving and transportation tasks in this construction simulator. In this Heavy construction machinery transport game, initially, you have to drive some monster construction trucks and excavator trains to a transport truck platform. You can load upto 5 different construction machines on the transport trawler. Show extra care while loading gigantic construction vehicles on the transport trawler. Take extreme care of the transport edges while loading heavy duty machines. Drive the mega transport truck to the construction site where civil engineering works have been carried out with multiple construction machines on your back such as dumper truck, construction excavator cranes, concrete mixer, road roller, water tanker, loader trucker and monster trucks. Carefully drive the transport truck through city roads and concrete highway tracks. Do not accelerate much as you are carrying extremely heavy weight machinery which can cause highway accidents. So drive slowly in this challenging drive and enjoy the fun of transporting construction machines and heavy trucks to the construction site. Transport Bull dozer and Haul Trucks through highway city tracks. Help civil engineering construction missions by transporting heavy delivery machines in time.Your drop off mission is not complete yet, you have to unload heavy construction vehicles to the ground by driving carefully. Fulfill your dream of driving monster trucks, construction truckers 3d and handling huge trucks. This construction machines transport will give you the dual benefit of both driving heavy duty machines as well as transporting them via transport trawler. Take extra care on sharp turns and sudden twists with these loaded vehicle. Make use of fork lifter during unloading loaded vehicle. Enjoy the fun filled challenging of transporting machines like dumper truck, construction excavator cranes, concrete mixer, road roller, water tanker, loader trucker and monster trucks to the designated site. Prevent machines from falling on sharp turns and sudden twists. Construction Machines Transporter Cargo Truck Game Features:- Transport different construction machines- Construction vehicles drop off mission- Enjoy driving monster trucks, construction truckers 3d- 3D Construction site environments- Multiple city tracks to designated site- 3D fork lifter for loaded vehicle- Classic weather conditions- Bull dozer and Haul Trucks transportation

descriptionHTML:
Enjoy the soothing sensation of whittling a blunt stick into a beautiful point in Whittler! Carve up multicolored sticks with your knife! Make your points even pointier!

Controls:
Swipe up on the screen to start whittling!
Spin the stick by swiping right and left at the bottom of the screen.
Zoom in by holding the "+" button.
Zoom out by holding the "-" button.
Hold the reset button for a fresh stick.
If you've whittled your stick down, hold the up arrow to feed out more stick.
Double tap the screen to toggle the interface.
recentChanges: Changed shading to be off at first so more people can play more easily.
Turn shading on or off in the options menu.
Rearranged options menu and added save system to store options settings.
summary: Make Your Point!
title: Whittler

comments: I have only had the game a few hours and I am already falling in love with it. It is great to go on when you have a spare 10-15 minutes. The grid is larger than others so I can read the words fluently and quickly without them being hard to see. You get points after each time you complete the grid so if you are really stuck you can receive a hint for some points. I would highly recommend this excellent game.

Only been playing for a few days now, and so far, I love it! Forgot how fun Word Search puzzles can be, and to have it on my phone is priceless lol.. No complaints with the app so far. I will say though, maybe they should tweak it just a tad, instead of giving a hint only after a short moment, possibly creating 'the option' to have a hint may be a little better. Not a big deal to me. It truly is a great app, love the simplicity of the graphic design too. Glad I came across this game.

I enjoy ALMOST the whole game, being a word find and all, simple, yet deceptively hard at times. Still, I wish there was a way to turn off the 'hints' it gives, as they get annoying... unless there IS a way that I haven't discovered yet...otherwise, I REALLY like the game, and would suggest it to all ages, as it's not too tough for the young ones, but still challenging enough for experienced players.

Pretty good word search game. It's sometimes hard to hit the right letters, especially toward the bottom of the screen. Occasionally words share more than one letter in common. Sometimes  (especially in the  lower levels) a word will show up more than  once in a puzzle. Maybe extra credit for finding a word that's not on the list?

It's a good game but there needs to be a way to turn off hints. If you don't find a word in the time it thinks you should, it keeps giving hints which ruins the gameplay. I pause for various reasons like talking to someone, cat catching a mouse, watching tv at the time, etc.. Or sometimes it might take longer to fins a word than seconds allowed before the hint.

I love this game. Really nice and well thought out game. It's educative too. But I have just one issue with it though: The flashing hint. This gets me distracted each time it flashes. Maybe there could be a hint button at the bottom of the puzzle. That way instead of it flashing and getting us distracted, we could just click on it whenever we need help. Apart from that, it's just perfect. Will give it a 5 when the flashing hint is worked onüòÅ

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.
