descriptionHTML:
Grow Phone
It’s a new concept game and growing the phone by your touch.

Released Event - The reward of second generation board achievement is jewels(Limited Time)

*HOT TIME EVENT*
1. Light Time : 08:00~09:00
x2 Battery Capacity UP
2. So Hot Time : 12:00~13:00
x1.5 Battery Capacity and x1.5 Battery recovery
3. Fever Time : 19:00~20:00
x2 Battery Capacity UP

■ Feature
- It’s possible to create your phone.
- It’s a new type game and not normal.
- Just by playing touch, you can stress relief.
- It’s possible to see the evolution of your phone.
- Try to play a battery acceleration and booster skill
- Easy to play and various modules

■ Information for enjoy playing
- Signal starts up from a battery.
- When the signal arrives to CPU, RAM, each module, the module is charged.
- When module gauge is full, it’s possible to get the gold
- It’s possible to get more gold by the module upgrade.
- It’s possible to send more signal to module by the battery upgrade.
- By the technical point (TP), it’s possible to upgrade the board.
- If upgrade the board, it’s possible to add new modules.
- Signal speed up by holding touch
- It’s possible to charge the battery fast by battery touch when the battery is out of battery.
- Press the bonus button that appears momentarily in the game. By the bonus button, buff is activated. Also, buff, it’s able to be accrued (Combo).

■ Caption
- If your phone is changed or uninstall the game, the data is deleted. You had batter push the save button.

■ Request Permission
- About the access permission Info.
Request access to permission follow

[Storage]
• Modify or delete SD card contents
• read the contents of your SD card
[Phone]
• read phone status and identity
• directly call phone numbers
[Contacts]
• read your contacts
• find accounts on the device

■ CS
- If you have install or playing problems, please contact to E-mail.
(help@mobile-game.co.kr) We're going to reply it ASAP.

■ Login error solution
1. Run 'Play Games' App
2. Go to 'setting' menu
3. Check on to 'Sign in to games automatically'

■Notice for Load and Save functions
- When you Save a Data, a previous data will be deleted if there is a previous data.
- When you Load a saved data, on going data will be deleted.

■ Brand page : http://mobile-game.co.kr/eng/

Each hero has its corresponding fated set of gears. Collecting a complete set of gear for the hero you love can brings bonus to hero's characteristics of ATK, HP, Rebound,Leech,Tenacity,Dodge,Hit and Crit. Adopt advanced tactics and blow your enemies heads.

Team up an invincible squad and then challenge other players in Tournament, Cross-server Arena, and League war to become a Fighter of Universe in Hall of Fame.

GO FOR FREE NOW!

descriptionHTML:

comments: Great  game control,craphics, its just that need a little upgrage, its juts that when somebody attack you. You dont get a sheld after they attack so they contunie attacking your ark. Second some of my army is gone or vanish atfer you train with loots the few hours or day ill gone like' woooh what happend. I hope youl fix it as soon as possible.. thank by the way its a great game so far.

Unfortunately this game is a pay to win game. Levels 1-8 is a walk in the park. Once you hit level 9 you will be attacked 20-50 times a day from people harvesting resources for their own gain. After 4 months I finally reached level 10 and I can't generate enough resources to level up. Even with all the bonuses and specials they give you. The purchases are expensive so expect to spend 1k to be at the top of the game.  I delete most games when I am forced to spend money to defend my stuff. The response I get from this will be a copy and paste BS this is a pay to win game no matter how you look at it

Yet another game which shows adverts and images to completely mislead you into thinking the game may be something different instead it's the same as every other build this, wait for this, spend money on gold to rush things. Played for all of about 4 minutes. Should of stopped after 3 seconds when it's obvious it's just another money making cash cow. What ever happened to false advertising  being punished by some kind of authority.

It's really tough to advance when you constantly keep getting pounded by players far bigger than you. I spent 3 days with a shield just to have my army wiped out completely when it dropped. To be honest I'm not sure why I haven't just quit yet. This game needs better protection for the lower level players.  Perhaps change the upgrade system to like the one for the guild fort and allow partial deposits of resources to upgrade structures.

RUN AWAY,,the EULA gives state sponsored pay to win players HUGE discounts so China owns 88% of all maps and the other big guilds will farm you to prevent your resources from building up. In short; don't download this as it caters to big guilds farming starting players and if you are viewed as a threat all big guilds will collude and farm you non stop.

Cool game. However, since the last update more than 1,000 of my soldiers have disappeared. I have yet to get a response from the in-game support. It's a pretty boring game when you do not have any soldiers. Before the update it was a great game, now I'm not sure if I can play it anymore.
description: - Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!I built, I sailed, I conquered!Join the battle NOW!With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.Mighty Space Arks- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.Ultimate Galactic Military Power- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.MMO Strategic Gameplay- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. descriptionHTML:
- Enter your country's guild and vie with players from all over the globe to become the ruler of the universe!
- When you download the game now, you'll be one of the first to receive $10 in new player boosters while supplies last!

I built, I sailed, I conquered!
Join the battle NOW!

With the expansion of the population, Earth is becoming increasingly crowded. The whole galaxy has turned into a new battlefield between human beings and extraterrestrial civilizations. Though governed by the Imperial Federation Government. The galaxy is still in the upheaval between various powers. On Planet Tekkman, you and alien creatures will operate your own space arks and create formidable fleets to confront against the Imperial Federation Government, fighting for living space and rebuilding the order.

Mighty Space Arks
- Construct your fortress on huge space arks.
- Operate the space ark on the battlefield in any way you deem.
- Battle like a carrier, attack your enemies while moving your ark.

Ultimate Galactic Military Power
- Upgrade your ark to elevate its power and change its appearance.
- Collect, equip and evolve terrific human and alien commanders.
- Establish your armed forces consisting of space infantries, mechs and spacecrafts.

MMO Strategic Gameplay
- Launch large-scale and real-time wars of alliance between hundreds of arks.
- Grab territories for your alliance with players from all around the world and chat through real-time translation.
- Dominate and govern a planet and rule over it. Use diplomacy to establish the order of your world.
- Trade your equipment and resources with other players and become a space merchant.
developerAddress: No.1 Queen's Road Central Hong Kong

- Added The Galactic Campaign Avatar Frames;

descriptionHTML:
Duel players from all around the world in the best real-time game! Collect and upgrade 40+ troops and spells: from the lovely Dryad to the tremendous Dragon! Play now, for free!

Lead your army to victory! Build a strong deck and crush your enemy's castle deploying your troops! Earn trophies and climb the global ranking! Fight the enemy clans and defend your army! Open your chests to discover and unlock new powerful warriors and spells! Will you get one of the magic legendary cards?

Define your strategy and choose your warriors carefully. Archers to kill from a distance? A Royale Golem to break through the defense? Or a heal spell to give a boost to your troops? Your decision will make the difference between victory and defeat!

FEATURES
+ Duel other players in epic battles
+ Collect new powerful troops
+ Destroy opponent’s castles to unlock new cards
+ Progress through multiple levels all the way to the top
+ Learn different battle tactics and become the ultimate champion
+ Free Daily cards
+ Open magical chests
+ Earn trophies
+ Join legendary clans
+ Fun, intuitive mechanics
+ Real-time duelling game
+ Play for free!
+ Ideal for all types of players - kids and adults, girls and boys...

Get into the arena and clash against other players on epic battles! The combat may be hard, prepare your strategy to win this pvp war game!

One of the best multiplayer strategy games! Join now this epic card game and have fun fighting your enemies!

description: You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. With no friends among his fellow inmates, you must rely only on yourself.Solve the puzzles, discover the hidden objects, manipulate the prisoners and guards, use your skills, do whatever it takes, and become an inmate who destined to escape..‚Üó An addictive prison escape game!‚Üó Solve the puzzles and use your skills to escape!‚Üó Manipulate the prisoners and guards!‚Üó Gorgeous graphics and different themed rooms!‚Üó Addicting mini puzzles!‚Üó Do whatever it takes to escape!‚Üó Escape from maximum security prison!‚Üó Easy and fun to play!Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/amphibiusgames/
descriptionHTML:
You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. With no friends among his fellow inmates, you must rely only on yourself.

Solve the puzzles, discover the hidden objects, manipulate the prisoners and guards, use your skills, do whatever it takes, and become an inmate who destined to escape..

Best game ever!!! The fourth and final installment of the five nights at Freddy's series is the best one! So, basically you're a kid who is trapped in his room and you have to make it to 6AM without being jumpscared by any of the nightmarish animatronics. There are little freddles that will occasionally pop up on your bed, and you shoo them with your flashlight. Do this and Freddy won't ruin your fun. Check the closet door for foxy or he will get you. If you hear breathing, then check the doors. If someone is there, shut it.

Amazing series. You are simply an amazing developer, Scott. You pump out games like this even though there are so much haters you have to endure, I respect you. A great ending to a series, but I do know there's DLC. Anyways, congrats on the movie being made by the Warner Bros. 5 Stars all the way Scott. description: NOTE: This game requires at least 512 megs of RAM. Phones with less than that may crash!This is a 2-night demo of the game. If you enjoyed it, get the full version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf4In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.
descriptionHTML:
NOTE: This game requires at least 512 megs of RAM. Phones with less than that may crash!

This is a 2-night demo of the game. If you enjoyed it, get the full version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf4

In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.

You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.
summary: This time, the terror has followed you home!
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 Demo

comments: I'm kind of in a love/hate relationship with this game.  The concept is great, it controls great it's addictive.  The fact there are 30 sec unskipable advertisement is unforgiving. The fact you can't earn coins in online mode. (Effectively avoiding the advertisement) now explain to me why when I am online, the game is in offline mode which doesn't allow me to collect coins, but I still get advertisement.  It's btw quicker to when an advertisement starts to close the app and restart it, seriously It tested it.

This game is awesome but when it says that you going to get a new track and adds minutes onto the waiting time for your track you were going to get a new track. The controls are really bad and you can't stearer properly you crash and you die in the game

Whomever made this game. Has no concept of the laws of physics or how to properly calibrate controls for a video game. Awesome idea.  Extremely poor execution. Watching paint dry is a better way to spend your time. Just so I'm clear. This is realistically one of the worst games/apps in the world. Almost a waste of effort to write a review. Almost.

Im all for a tough challenge, but this is ridiculous from the rip! It's almost impossible to control. Why not make it easier at first, then progressively harder? This is crazy hard from the start. Let me get good at it before you throw the crazy hard levels out. How can I get better if I can't play past 50 feet? I want to play this game, and I don't give up if I fail once, but if I fail like the first 300 times I guess I'll just never be good at it. So sadly, I have to move on from this game.

Love this game. Though there seem to be no option to skip ads after the recent update. I don't mind ads cuz you can just skip it but if you force people to watch ads in it's entirety, that's just inconvenient & annoying

description: Smash or Pass is a challenge game based on popular YouTube Smash or Pass game where you vote would you rather smash or pass. You can select between famous youtubers (vloggers) and celebrities, both men and women in this casual game.You can also upload your own images and share them with others so they could smash it or pass it. Each uploaded image have it's own unique number that you can share with others and see how much smash or pass will that quiz image get. You can see all your uploaded images on your profile.You can see top list of uploaded people. As your uploaded image get more smashes you will climb in top list.Game have standard tuber simulator, you can click on either SMASH button if you would smash or on PASS button if you would pass.After you click Smash or Pass you will see details for that person how other people voted, how many people would rather smash or pass. You can see total number of smash or pass votes, how many people in total would rather smash, how many men would rather smash, how many women would rather smash and how many other would rather smash. You can also see either how many people in total would rather pass, how many men would rather pass, how many women would rather pass and how many other would rather pass.Smash or Pass is a either.io type of game and is played by many youtubers, vloggers, celebrities and others.Open Smash or Pass app and choose either would you rather smash or pass adult youtubers (vloggers), celebrities or custom uploaded person.The Smash or Pass challenge is inspired by popular youtubers like pewdiepie and jacksepticeye.Smash or Pass will look great on all phones and tablets including Samsung Galaxy S8 and Samsung Galaxy S8 plus, LG G6, Motorola Moto Z, Samsung Galaxy S7 and Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, Apple iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7s Plus, iPhone 8 or iPhone X, HTC 10, Google Pixel XL, HTC U11, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy Note5, Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus LG G5, Apple iPad, upcoming Samsung Galaxy Note8 and Galaxy S9, Lenovo P2, Huawei P10 Plus, Huawei Honor 8 Pro, Sony Xperia XZ Premium, OnePlus 3T, Xiaomi Mi 6 and more.Enjoy in best Smash or Pass challenge game!
descriptionHTML:
Smash or Pass is a challenge game based on popular YouTube Smash or Pass game where you vote would you rather smash or pass.

You can select between famous youtubers (vloggers) and celebrities, both men and women in this casual game.

You can also upload your own images and share them with others so they could smash it or pass it. Each uploaded image have it's own unique number that you can share with others and see how much smash or pass will that quiz image get. You can see all your uploaded images on your profile.

You can see top list of uploaded people. As your uploaded image get more smashes you will climb in top list.

Game have standard tuber simulator, you can click on either SMASH button if you would smash or on PASS button if you would pass.

After you click Smash or Pass you will see details for that person how other people voted, how many people would rather smash or pass. You can see total number of smash or pass votes, how many people in total would rather smash, how many men would rather smash, how many women would rather smash and how many other would rather smash. You can also see either how many people in total would rather pass, how many men would rather pass, how many women would rather pass and how many other would rather pass.

Smash or Pass is a either.io type of game and is played by many youtubers, vloggers, celebrities and others.

Open Smash or Pass app and choose either would you rather smash or pass adult youtubers (vloggers), celebrities or custom uploaded person.

The Smash or Pass challenge is inspired by popular youtubers like pewdiepie and jacksepticeye.

Smash or Pass will look great on all phones and tablets including Samsung Galaxy S8 and Samsung Galaxy S8 plus, LG G6, Motorola Moto Z, Samsung Galaxy S7 and Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, Apple iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7s Plus, iPhone 8 or iPhone X, HTC 10, Google Pixel XL, HTC U11, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy Note5, Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus LG G5, Apple iPad, upcoming Samsung Galaxy Note8 and Galaxy S9, Lenovo P2, Huawei P10 Plus, Huawei Honor 8 Pro, Sony Xperia XZ Premium, OnePlus 3T, Xiaomi Mi 6 and more.

Enjoy in best Smash or Pass challenge game!

description: Its a physics puzzle game.Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
descriptionHTML:
Its a physics puzzle game.
Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity.
You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon..
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines!
This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button.
summary: Its a nice brain-training game.
title: Puzzle Studio - Physical Line

description: Downhill mountain bike racing like never before. Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps, scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes and gear for bragging rights as the King of the Mountain!The best mobile bike game, Bike Mayhem Extreme Mountain Racing! Compete in timed races or freestyle trick events on 19 different mountains and over 100 trails inspired by real world locations.Unlock over 80 items of gear to add style your rider and tune your bike for speed, agility, strength, and energy for each trail.Experience realistic physics and plush bike suspension as your bike eats up the rough stuff and softens the landings of big jumps and drops. High speeds and big jumps means huge crashes where your rider will ragdoll tumble down the trail. Use your finger to pick up you rider throw him even further.Share your races with your friends. Challenge them to beat your times! Brought to you by the makers of the epically popular Motocross racing game: Moto X Mayhem, which reached #1 Paid App worldwide and was a Top 5 Racing game for over a year! FEATURES: - 100+ Beautiful mountain trails for all styles of riding- 80+ Gear items for your rider and MTB bike - Frame and wheel upgrades that impact game play- Epic bike crashes, fun rag doll physics and active bike suspension- Tricks, bunny hops and flips! - Addictive gameplay - Powerful online leaderboardsTIPS: - If you use check points, you will get a maximum of one star. Stay on your bike to achieve 3 stars! - Lean to add flips into your trick combo. - Wheelie into and out of a jump to add to your trick combo.- Hold down the pump/hop button when entering a downhill section to get a boost in speed.- Wheelies do not drain your energy- The timer doesn't start until you start to pedal the bike or brake! - Use your finger to grab the rider and toss him around the map when you're on or off the bike. - Make sure you pick the right frame and wheel combination to get the best score for each trail.-Use boosters to help you through a difficult trail or to get the top position on the leaderboard.See a video of this crazy action packed mountain bike game at: http://www.youtube.com/BestFreeGamesIncFollow us @facebook.com/bikemayhemtwitter.com/BestFreeGamesCo
descriptionHTML:
Downhill mountain bike racing like never before. Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps, scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes and gear for bragging rights as the King of the Mountain!

The best mobile bike game, Bike Mayhem Extreme Mountain Racing!

Compete in timed races or freestyle trick events on 19 different mountains and over 100 trails inspired by real world locations.

Unlock over 80 items of gear to add style your rider and tune your bike for speed, agility, strength, and energy for each trail.

Experience realistic physics and plush bike suspension as your bike eats up the rough stuff and softens the landings of big jumps and drops.
High speeds and big jumps means huge crashes where your rider will ragdoll tumble down the trail. Use your finger to pick up you rider throw him even further.

Share your races with your friends. Challenge them to beat your times!

Brought to you by the makers of the epically popular Motocross racing game: Moto X Mayhem, which reached #1 Paid App worldwide and was a Top 5 Racing game for over a year!

FEATURES:

- 100+ Beautiful mountain trails for all styles of riding
- 80+ Gear items for your rider and MTB bike
- Frame and wheel upgrades that impact game play
- Epic bike crashes, fun rag doll physics and active bike suspension
- Tricks, bunny hops and flips!
- Addictive gameplay
- Powerful online leaderboards

TIPS:

- If you use check points, you will get a maximum of one star. Stay on your bike to achieve 3 stars!
- Lean to add flips into your trick combo.
- Wheelie into and out of a jump to add to your trick combo.
- Hold down the pump/hop button when entering a downhill section to get a boost in speed.
- Wheelies do not drain your energy
- The timer doesn't start until you start to pedal the bike or brake!
- Use your finger to grab the rider and toss him around the map when you're on or off the bike.
- Make sure you pick the right frame and wheel combination to get the best score for each trail.
-Use boosters to help you through a difficult trail or to get the top position on the leaderboard.

descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
summary: Join Emily and Patrick in a hilarious battle of the sexes!
title: Delicious - Moms vs Dads

What a great game! Forget the haters who say its laggy, just because they don't want to blame it on their wifi. I like how it is so simple, yet exciting and fast paced. Good graphics, great gameplay, and good controls. To make it even better, please add a bouncy, funky backing track to really put the player in the tank. Also the game can freeze occasionally, so debug that if you can. Side note: you do have to reach over a bit too much to upgrade, but don't let my cons sidetrack you from a GREAT GAME!!!!!!!!!

comments: Disappointing  ending but overall great! Though  the beginning   could have been better to.
Made me cry ;-; and I love the opportunity that you can create your own story <3
OMG I love this game all though one part sucked at the end it made me cry, this game! I hate the ending! Please change it. Even though....I hate change.üòâ (For the Nicole part)

Keeps your attention for its entire duration. Also there are no pointless long intervals between messages like in some other games of the genre. Nicole's dialogue is very... real, totally like what a real girl would say. Including paradoxes like "plz don't change eh en though I probably will", that's female logic at its finest. Although how would I know ehat a real girl speaks like? :-P Mark's dialogue choices, on the other hand, sometimes seem unrealistic, sometimes silly and childish, sometimes plain stupid. Totally NOT like what a real guy would act like. Kinda aggravating, you could've had more options in this regard. The interface looks like a real messaging app, and actually I'd rather use Seen for messaging than my built-in messaging app.  Authors, consider that as an option. Kudos for the interface. :-) Overall, a very good one.

A truly touching experience. I loved this game, the ending's twist had me thinking for hours for some reason. It has so well built up characters that you actually feel for them. Overall, a very good game.

Love interest is insufferable, the typing is cumbersome, just selecting a response would be better than the strangely specific not-a-keyboard, and it doesn't seem that your selections have any bearing on the plot or outcome.

descriptionHTML:
What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again? Seen is an interactive story set in high school where you play as Mark Blythe, a student who fell in love with the new fellow student, Nicole Tyler. Do you have what it takes to catch her heart?

Get to know Nicole, Mike, Jake, Jenny, and Valerie. Explore various outcomes based on your decisions in a world where change is inevitable. This game features a remake of "annie96 is typing..." by Pascal Chatterjee, a creepy chat history that took Reddit and Twitter by storm.

FEATURES
• Different outcomes based on your choices
• Make your own stories with Story Maker
• Play other players' stories and share your own with Story World
• Includes "annie96 is typing...", the creepiest chat history you’ll ever play
• Realistic chat client inspired by Facebook Messenger

Seen is not just an interactive story game, it's a platform for interactive story games! Make your very own chat stories with Story Maker. The possibilities are endless. The only limit is your imagination.

Once you're done making a story, let the world play it with Story World and play others' stories as well. Story World is an in-game community where players can upload and download stories (currently in Beta).

FOLLOW US
• PolychromaGames.com
• facebook.com/PolychromaGames
• twitter.com/PolychromaGames

DONATE
• bit.ly/2btduCy

We always make sure that our games are of high quality so if you encounter a problem, please don't hesitate to contact us :)
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Make links clickable in chat messages (Linkify for Story Maker)
‚Ä¢ View and update downloaded stories (Library for Story World)
‚Ä¢ Story World now suggests similar stories
‚Ä¢ Filter Story World stories by keyword
summary: What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again?
title: Seen

comments: Terrible performance Please fix the performance problem. My old phone with mtk quadcore and mali t720 run smoothly. An why my new phone powered mtk octa core helio x10 with powervr g6200 runs like potato phones.

If was really short and it took my brother 2 days to finish it ,so if you're looking for a short app this is the one you want.
description:
After a mind-blowing 70 M+ installs, we now know for a fact that you loved being trolled. That‚Äôs why Troll Face Quest is back with an all new, fun trolling sensation: Troll Face Quest Memes! Troll your way around this wacky world as notorious internet memes try to bring you to the brink of insanity. Solve mind-boggling puzzles and beat the wacky memes at their own game!
KOOKY FEATURES‚Ä¢ 35+ wacky puzzles that will make you laugh your lungs out!‚Ä¢ Unlock wildly insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Conquer the global trolling leaderboard!‚Ä¢ Play anytime, anywhere. Wi-Fi not needed!
INTERNET MEME FRENZYMake your way through insane levels, where famous internet memes continuously play tricks on you. Attempt to hold onto your wits and not fall into the memes‚Äô traps. comments: I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

Super fun needs minor improvements Actually very fun but could use a speedometer calibration, the cars go from 215 mph and shoot way down to 170 in the corners of the first track, the speed seems too fast for what the cars are actually doing.. It seems a little stretched but that's all. and sound improvements for the cars ... Other than that it's legit

Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

Needs lots of improvement......... 1. Improve graphics quality like extreme car racing . It will improve the game.  2. Increase the number of opponents in the race.  3. Seriously I don't believe that you added 400 laps race , I think it will be better to race rookies cup which give you 1000 dollar games in just 5 lap.     And you are providing 3000 game dollar for 400 laps . I think you should decrease the 400 laps to 100 or 60 laps it will be a better choice. 4. You have added pit lane in the game so provide a pit stop in the game also .

Great Game but can they add something! Add in cautions, working pit Stalls with tire ware and fuel usage, and tire air pressure adjustment settings so we do get as loose as we do. If you do I will make a YouTube Series about the game and keep this good review!

If possible need there needs to be another look at the position of your car during the race. Ice noticed mulitple times that once i get to first place, i win in first but when i go ro collect thw reward cash it always says seventh or eighth place.. its really irking.  Please fix. Otherwise i do enjoy the game

Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!RACE MODES :Multiplayer - Race head to head against other playersRegulation  - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizesLadder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game CenterPractice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trimCARS:Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

description: Express yourself and become a style maven in the #1 dressup boutique simulation game!Designed for style savvy women of all ages, it‚Äôs free to play and you can play Fashion Empire while offline. The game is constantly updated and full of fabulous gameplay-- CHIC FASHIONS to sell, mix and match and grow your fortune- DECORATE your boutiques with thousands of gorgeous decorations- DESIGN thousands of unique items ranging from elegant to edgy- DRESS UP yourself and your trendy staff any way you choose- MAKEOVERS with all the latest makeup and cosmetics trends- COLLECT and covet special designer, elite and signature items- SHOP furniture - racks, tables, registers, displays and much more - STORY mode with fashion shows, fascinating characters and freedom- ADVENTURE to the top with hundreds of quests across many cities- WIN big and show off in online challenges - it‚Äôs fashion week every day!- JOIN a vibrant fashion loving communityThe game is free to play and in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency.Game background and how to play:1/ You start in San Francisco, an aspiring designer just opened your first shop. You've always been creative, from playing dress up with barbie dolls as a kid, hours on the sims, learning to sketch and creating an amazing portfolio at a top design academy. Together with your investor Eva you'll begin by designing your very first item - a gorgeous pink dress which is sure to bring in initial shoppers2/ After making your first sales you'll want to expand capacity for racks, registers, dressing rooms - and don't forget decorations to attract the style minded clients.3/ As your boutique grows you'll learn more and unlock more outfit categories of items - shoes, heels, bags, purses, rompers, jumpsuits, makeup, cosmetics, accessories and more.4/ After a while you'll probably find yourself busy as the sole worker in your boutique - it will be time to find the perfect staff to join you on your journey. descriptionHTML:
Express yourself and become a style maven in the #1 dressup boutique simulation game!

Designed for style savvy women of all ages, it’s free to play and you can play Fashion Empire while offline. The game is constantly updated and full of fabulous gameplay-

- CHIC FASHIONS to sell, mix and match and grow your fortune
- DECORATE your boutiques with thousands of gorgeous decorations
- DESIGN thousands of unique items ranging from elegant to edgy
- DRESS UP yourself and your trendy staff any way you choose
- MAKEOVERS with all the latest makeup and cosmetics trends
- COLLECT and covet special designer, elite and signature items
- SHOP furniture - racks, tables, registers, displays and much more
- STORY mode with fashion shows, fascinating characters and freedom
- ADVENTURE to the top with hundreds of quests across many cities
- WIN big and show off in online challenges - it’s fashion week every day!
- JOIN a vibrant fashion loving community

The game is free to play and in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency.

Game background and how to play:

1/ You start in San Francisco, an aspiring designer just opened your first shop. You've always been creative, from playing dress up with barbie dolls as a kid, hours on the sims, learning to sketch and creating an amazing portfolio at a top design academy. Together with your investor Eva you'll begin by designing your very first item - a gorgeous pink dress which is sure to bring in initial shoppers

2/ After making your first sales you'll want to expand capacity for racks, registers, dressing rooms - and don't forget decorations to attract the style minded clients.

3/ As your boutique grows you'll learn more and unlock more outfit categories of items - shoes, heels, bags, purses, rompers, jumpsuits, makeup, cosmetics, accessories and more.

4/ After a while you'll probably find yourself busy as the sole worker in your boutique - it will be time to find the perfect staff to join you on your journey. But first you'll need to find a way to persuade them to join - and each have their own story to tell and personality to work with.

5/ San Francisco is just the beginning, soon you'll be expanding to Las Vegas, Miami, Los Angeles and even New York. There you'll get to know celebs and stars who will warm to your unique style and, in time, crave and covet your latest collections. And who knows what glamorous occasions you'll be designing for...

6/ Your reputation is starting to grow and it's time to prove yourself on the world stage amongst millions of other players. This is your chance to show your interior designs and outfits in challenging online themed contests, whether it's celebrity style or coffee casual, from red carpet to haute couture runway...

Ladies, the next big dressup game is here - it's time to write YOUR stylish story.

Questions or requests? Email us at fashionempire@frenzoo.com

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

Used to be better It nags you to death about installing Google Games, as if it won't run right without it (runs fine). Then if you install it it nags you to login. All this so that you can do stuff I have no interest in, like posting your scores online.  Allow us to turn off the nagging, please. This is the best bowling app I've seen, which is a sad statement about the quality of bowling apps. Unrealistic physics for the pin action that make it impossible to ever do a split. No way to impart a spin on the ball.

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.

I've been playing this game for 2 years now and I love it. The screen doesn't bounce around and jerk like some of the other games, or flash brite colors at you. Just line your ball up with your arrows just like real bowling. I got 7 strikes in a row one time.üê∂üê∂üê∂

description: üòú You can‚Äôt miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you‚Äôre taken on a hilarious adventure where you‚Äôll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.üòä To spare their embarrassment, we‚Äôre not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won‚Äôt escape Troll Face‚Äôs ridiculous pranks. üò¨ TROLL OR BE TROLLED?How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? descriptionHTML:
😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! We love your feedback! What’s your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!

#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames

comments: The game is cute. Very straightforward and not at all time consuming but relaxing to check in every  once in a while. I loved visiting my Axolotl every day. Mine grew up to almost 9 cm! Unfortunalely, I didn't  check in for a few days. I checked every day until suddenly I forgot. Poor Lottie is gone now but I'm going to do my best to be a good virtual Axolotl owner this time!! The only thing I would like differently is I'd like more interactions with the axolotl and to be able to zoom in. Anyways, its an overall lovely game. Simple but sweet.

It's like having an Axolotl, but on your phone! It's extremely hard to find one around where I live, so I guess this is the closest one I could get for now? I love Axolotls and I dream of getting my own smiling water-walker. They're so cute! Thank you for making this app I love it. But try to make more options in communicating with the little dude. And I like the idea of scrubbing the screens instead of pushing a button. Something that will make it not too button-pressy-game thingy?

I was very excited when I saw this as a love an axlotle but although he is very cute there is just not enough interaction. You can only have one and you can name him but he only needs fed and cleaned every 4 days. You can't decorate the aquarium and, as I mentioned, you can't get any friends for him. It has potential but there needs to be more interaction and an ability to personalise the environment.

AMAZING AND SUPER CUTE! Doesn't take up alot of storage. I think it needs more interactions but that's is! Also could you add a feature to get another pet after your original has been alive for a certain amount of days because they look lonely.

I think that you definitely need more things to do. It would be great if you could do more things and maybe get more Axolotl! THEY MUST BE SO LONELY! I also think that it should let u personalise the tank and maybe make it so u can design your Axolotl! Other than that it is a EPIC game. (Will rake 5 star if u do) ;-)

Love it but I feel there's something missing. A few suggestions would be maybe being able to upgrade or rearrange some of the aquarium decor also if we were able to clean the tank ourselves by swiping it clean with our finger. Another idea would be having a friend for our pet. Overall it's a cute app.

descriptionHTML:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the 「Axolotl」 to this already popular game! FREE DOWNLOAD! It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

■Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.
■Watch how cute your Axolotl moves. It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone. It`s so easy to raise. Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week. This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious. Try this game out! It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.
- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Axolotl a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Axolotl grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
summary: How would you like to experience the warm feeling of raising your own Axolotl?
title: Axolotl Pet

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!

This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids‚Äô breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom‚Äôs daily life. The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don‚Äôt let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:‚Ä¢ High Quality 3D Graphics‚Ä¢ Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! ‚Ä¢ Smooth and Easy Controls‚Ä¢ Addictive Game Play‚Ä¢ Super Cool House Environment‚Ä¢ Family Woman Life Simulation‚Ä¢ Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete

comments: I wish these dumb ass games tell you that you can only play 9 levels before you have to buy the rest of the game. Having to pay for any part of the game means it's not free like you claim it is. Don't waste your time with this game.

Once you pass level 9, you have to pay for VIP. I don't like this and am uninstalling this app because of it. This was supposed to be a  free app. This is very disappointing, for I liked this app. I have been playing it all weekend, and just now passed level 9, which then said if I wanted to continue, i would have to pay for VIP. I am appointing any one who is going to get this app, to not, because of this. It is very dissappointing. The graphics however, are excellent, same with the gameplay. If you're stuck ok a level, you can click the lightbulb and it will bring you to a YouTube video showing you how to get through the level which I found really useful, because these levels are pretty difficult. If you read all this, wow. Good job. And thank you for listening to my advice.  And Goblin LLC, I wish you did better and thought of others when making the VIP part. I won't be downloading any more of your apps.   Thank you.

Well how about the fact that you can only play half of the game, then you have to buy the other half of the levels.  Even buying the levels, the game on a whole, was a bit cr*ppy so I wouldn't waste my money. Maybe Goblin LLC,  should say that you have to buy almost 10 levels. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion so mine is: the game was bad. üòà
Well, I bought the 1st package for a dollar and played level 10 and I opened it this morning and the levels 10-12 are locked again. Wasted a dollar. Don't waste your time with this. Uninstalling

It is very challenging yet very fun. I finished 1-9 in a couple of hours. I do not like the fact that I cannot do 1-18, though. Plus, there are too many advertisments.  Overall, the game was extrordinary and very relaxing and satisfying, but you guys should limit the adds and give us more free levels to do. Thanks!
Entertaining and enjoyed it as not too hard (although I needed help a bit). I thought it worth paying a little extra for to get the final levels.

comments: The best app I've ever used. The most obsessed I've ever been with an app. Relaxing, enjoyable, creative. And no Ads! I paid the $1 or so optional upgrade fee to unlock all features and it allows you endless color possibilities. You can get so creative with this app. I also really enjoy being able to see others work. Cannot recommend this enough, especially for artists!

Only had it for a day, and already love it! You can make endless colours and patterns, all alongside the soothing sound of sand... very relaxing, great time killer, and an overall enjoyable app.   I have no problems with this, except for a few feature requests... - an "Undo" button, in case you make a mistake - a "Redo" button, in case you accidentally pressed undo - an option to select how much sand falls at a time, for example a thin flow or a thick flow - an option to choose on the density of the grains of sand, example fine grains or chunky grains

This is a great game and very easy to use but there is one thing that could be changed for me. That one thing would a way to erase the canvas and start a new one without choosing the finished option. But other than that this is a wonderful game!

Incredibly well designed and executed app. Probably one of the best on here. It's almost like they've invented a brand new media. Oh and Glitter Fly the only one scummy here is you. Expecting everything for nothing through the hard work of others.

Nicely done, I like how smooth the app works. I do have a suggestion, please introduce a way to erase or perhaps vacuum up unintended sand. I would give a higher rating if the app had some sort of undo feafure. Thanks.

Very relaxing.  Great for using as backgrounds on your phone too. Would like to see undo button and a quicker/ easier process to start a new canvas. Also, maybe a way to blow air at some areas to move sand around.
description: Thisissand is a creative playground for making and sharing pictures out of sand:‚Ä¢ Get surprised by the random beauty of layered sand‚Ä¢ Relax and relieve stress and anxiety with falling sand therapy‚Ä¢ Sign up to share your pieces with others and become a part of the community- - - - - - - - - -‚Ä¢ Free to download and free to play (offers an in-app purchase)‚Ä¢ Does not display ads‚Ä¢ Offers you to sign-up, but does not require you to‚Ä¢ Offers you to purchase a Toolkit of special features, but does not require you to- - - - - - - - - -Thisissand was created in 2008 as a website. It was a school project of a few art students, and to a surprise for the creators it attracted lots of visitors for years to come. In 2012 Thisissand was developed into an app and is still run by one of the original creators.Thisissand offers different kinds of tools for choosing the sand color. Originally, only the essential Color Palette tool was available. For the app, we have developed a few special kinds of tools which are available as the Toolkit in-app purchase. Just like on the website, the special tools are not at all necessary to enjoy the app, but we're happy for your support if you're willing to try them out.We're very thankful for all our users who have been able to support by purchasing, Thisissand would not exist without you!COLOR PALETTE: Use Color Palette to choose specific colors from a vast swatch of colors. You may choose a solid color, or multiple colors to variate between. Use the intensity slider to adjust how fast the colors change. You may also use the randomize button to get surprising color combos.COLOR SHIFTER: Color Shifter continuously changes the sand color subtly or dramatically depending on the intensity slider adjustment. Color Shifter often produces rainbow like hues. To set the initial Color Shifter color, choose a color with Color Palette and then select the Color Shifter tool.COLOR PICKER: With Color Picker, you may pick the sand color from around you using your device camera. It takes a little practice to point your camera and draw at the same time, but in return you get truly unique colors. Try adjusting the color change intensity low in the beginning to keep things under control!PHOTO SAND: Want to try making a sand version of one of your photos? Photo Sand picks the sand color directly from the photo you've chosen from your camera roll. Try it out and learn the tricks to make abstract and/or photorealistic representations!MY COLORS: Save your favorite colors in My Colors and access them quickly by long pressing the color button on the sand canvas. Try saving colors from around with Color Picker!- - - - - - - - - -We highly value your feedback and questions. Ideas and feature requests for example are warmly welcome, even though with our scarce resources we're unfortunately not able to fulfil them very quickly. So please do send us email if you're having trouble with the app or if you have anything else to share with us, thank you! :)support@thisissand.com- - - - - - - - - -Follow ustwitter.com/thisissandappinstagram.com/thisissandappfacebook.com/thisissand
descriptionHTML:
Thisissand is a creative playground for making and sharing pictures out of sand:

• Get surprised by the random beauty of layered sand
• Relax and relieve stress and anxiety with falling sand therapy
• Sign up to share your pieces with others and become a part of the community

- - - - - - - - - -

• Free to download and free to play (offers an in-app purchase)
• Does not display ads
• Offers you to sign-up, but does not require you to
• Offers you to purchase a Toolkit of special features, but does not require you to

- - - - - - - - - -

Thisissand was created in 2008 as a website. It was a school project of a few art students, and to a surprise for the creators it attracted lots of visitors for years to come. In 2012 Thisissand was developed into an app and is still run by one of the original creators.

Thisissand offers different kinds of tools for choosing the sand color. Originally, only the essential Color Palette tool was available. For the app, we have developed a few special kinds of tools which are available as the Toolkit in-app purchase. Just like on the website, the special tools are not at all necessary to enjoy the app, but we're happy for your support if you're willing to try them out.

We're very thankful for all our users who have been able to support by purchasing, Thisissand would not exist without you!

COLOR PALETTE: Use Color Palette to choose specific colors from a vast swatch of colors. You may choose a solid color, or multiple colors to variate between. Use the intensity slider to adjust how fast the colors change. You may also use the randomize button to get surprising color combos.

COLOR SHIFTER: Color Shifter continuously changes the sand color subtly or dramatically depending on the intensity slider adjustment. Color Shifter often produces rainbow like hues. To set the initial Color Shifter color, choose a color with Color Palette and then select the Color Shifter tool.

COLOR PICKER: With Color Picker, you may pick the sand color from around you using your device camera. It takes a little practice to point your camera and draw at the same time, but in return you get truly unique colors. Try adjusting the color change intensity low in the beginning to keep things under control!

PHOTO SAND: Want to try making a sand version of one of your photos? Photo Sand picks the sand color directly from the photo you've chosen from your camera roll. Try it out and learn the tricks to make abstract and/or photorealistic representations!

MY COLORS: Save your favorite colors in My Colors and access them quickly by long pressing the color button on the sand canvas. Try saving colors from around with Color Picker!

- - - - - - - - - -

We highly value your feedback and questions. Ideas and feature requests for example are warmly welcome, even though with our scarce resources we're unfortunately not able to fulfil them very quickly. So please do send us email if you're having trouble with the app or if you have anything else to share with us, thank you! :)

support@thisissand.com

- - - - - - - - - -

Follow us

twitter.com/thisissandapp
instagram.com/thisissandapp
facebook.com/thisissand
summary: "This is the perfect anti stress app for a mind with a creative itch."
title: Thisissand - Art, Creativity & Relaxation

comments: Couldn't even play.took at least 45 minutes to download when downloaded had to wait 25 minutes to load when i t finally loaded I clicked play and it didn't work clicked again and didn't work clicked it the third time and it took me to my home screen than I just uninstalled it.DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
It is a bad game you can buy it but it has a camera and can hack your information so be carful it trides to get in your head dont let it run for your life like neverbeforüòîüò¢

Personal Information???   It asked many personal information, when I was talking to the people. Some include how I look, my family, and more. It's a pretty dangerous game... My cousins didn't understand and almost fell for it. Luckily, I had enough experience and tried avoiding it. This is a dangerous game! It seems to be luring 1st-3rd graders to answering their questions because they wouldn't understand the dangers of sharing personal info. Don't download please! I told my cousins to be more cautious and to not answer the questions. I'm not sure if that girl... the people.... are "not taking info". You should be aware of that. I'm quite surprised that the reviews are not about this, in fact some other really childish things. I guess... this is a game to lure little kids to sharing their info, perhaps track them down. I don't know, it takes a child that understands the dangers to understand this. I'm pretty sure that most of the downloads come from little kids. My cousin, who is a kid (I won't share info here, due to trust issues) downloaded this and asked me to answer the questions from the little girl. I saw the little thing that this is a BOT, and would not take personal info, so first, I had no suspicion. But soon, the questions got more... Personal. I avoided them... and tried to change the subject. This is a dangerous game, once again. Please don't answer the questions from the people. I believe they are recording your information. I will look more into this game. Hope this review helped.

Not trying to be mean,but those people who gave it a 1 star yall are crazy this game is wonderful!!!? There's a lot of things you should like, like the graphics,you can dress up your charecter,talk to people, But still I'm not trying to be mean.

description: electric screen prank app is a super fun prank game. Prank your friends and family with this free game. Making jokes with this game is so simple; for example leave your mobile or tablet unlocked and when somebody touches the screen shall believe the screen creates electricity when is touched. The electricity effects and sounds simulate a electric shock.Have into account that this free app is just a game that simulates a electric screen shock. It is designed to joke with your friends and family. Kids and children also can have so much fun with this app. Besides the electric screen prank, the app also includes a mini game, which is used to obtain coins and unlock new lightning effects colors.The game consists of several parts: the electric screen prank game, the mini game Potty vs Bugs and the free coins virtual store. At the beginning the only available electric lightning color is the blue one. Other colors as red, yellow and green have to been unlocked. In order to do so the user needs to collect coins. Coins can be collected in several ways: playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, sharing on social networks (Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus) or watching rewarded videos. Each video the user watches gives +50 coins. If the player shares on any social network of the mentioned above also gets 50 coins but only for the first time that he/she shares.The free mini game included is Potty vs Bugs, an adventures platformer game based on a story of a potato, which has to pass 80 levels over 4 worlds to complete his mission. The game is really addictive and fun. The player will discover plenty of challenging levels, secret bricks full of rewards, hidden underground scenarios. Jump, run, swim, shoot fire balls and take a balloon to fly to the sky. There are plenty of different bugs awaiting the potato arrival. Many insects all over the 4 worlds, 8 final bosses in their respective castles. How to play this game is an easy task: move right or left, use the downward arrow of the game pad control to duck. Ducking on some tubes can make you go down through the pipes and find secret underground levels. Use the rightmost button to jump, and the one right on its left side to run and shoot fire balls. To run, the player has to keep the run button pressed while it moves right or left. Jumping is a bit tricky, since it depends on how long the user keeps the jump button pressed. As said before, the mini game is a great way of collecting coins to unlock new electric lightning color. Every level on the game is plenty of coins, some of them can be seen as part of the scenario, other are hidden on visible bricks and blocks, and the player can also find coins in secret blocks. The sky levels are a bonus to add more coins to the score of the game, which are used later to provide new content of the electric screen part. Remember that to store the coins collected in a level, the user has to finish that level.The design of the game is made thinking on create a environment to enjoy the prank app electric screen and have fun playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, all this joint to have a final goal, unlocking the strobe flash light effect. This shall be available once the user collects 2500 coins, then the user can have the electric lightning visual effect and the electric shock sound effect along with the strobe flashlight effect. Have into account that in order to enjoy of such effect your mobile device should have flashlight.

Skyblock Islands is the unique multiplayer hit you don’t want to miss! Combining strategy, RPG and FPS into an action packed arena shooter where you must choose your cards wisely and shoot first! Annihilate your opponents in one-on-one brawls where good strategy and quick reflexes are key to survival!

BRING YOUR CARDS TO BATTLE

Bring powerful heroes or explosive spells locked away in unique trading cards for you to collect! Shape your deck before the battle and see your strategy blow your enemy away! Find the cards that fit your play-style and put them to the test in one-on-one skirmishes in tight and deadly arenas!

Chat with your friends
Upgrade your cards
In app purchases for spell and unit upgrades

Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.

In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies!

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!

description: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ  5/5 ‚Äì Martynas Klimas, strategygamer.com‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ  4/5 ‚Äì Matt Skidmore, pockettactics.comWarbands:Bushido is a miniatures board game online arena with cards, miniatures, dice (i.e. dice random involved) and beautiful terrains to fight on, with both multiplayer battles boardgamers are used to, and challenging single-player scenarios.Game has a isometric, tabletop-style look with miniature-style characters, cards, dice, pre-rendered battlefields and story-mode scenarios. There will be more than 50 various paintable units and heroes planned for full-scale release and later additions. Multiplayer skirmish will let you test your skills in best traditions of tabletop wargame classics with a fast-paced gameplay. While single-player scenarios with their own characters and events, are highly influenced by classic turn-based RPG tactics.Game background - is the story of civil war in 16th century Japan, known as ‚ÄúWarring States period‚Äù. Samurais and ronins, criminals of all sorts, ninja clans, Chinese pirates, Portuguese mercenaries and firearms traders, all trying to benefit from anarchy and conflict. It is hard to find a more atmospheric and dense setting for a tactical board war games.
descriptionHTML:
★★★★★ 5/5 – Martynas Klimas, strategygamer.com
★★★★☆ 4/5 – Matt Skidmore, pockettactics.com

Warbands:Bushido is a miniatures board game online arena with cards, miniatures, dice (i.e. dice random involved) and beautiful terrains to fight on, with both multiplayer battles boardgamers are used to, and challenging single-player scenarios.

Game has a isometric, tabletop-style look with miniature-style characters, cards, dice, pre-rendered battlefields and story-mode scenarios. There will be more than 50 various paintable units and heroes planned for full-scale release and later additions. Multiplayer skirmish will let you test your skills in best traditions of tabletop wargame classics with a fast-paced gameplay. While single-player scenarios with their own characters and events, are highly influenced by classic turn-based RPG tactics.

Game background - is the story of civil war in 16th century Japan, known as “Warring States period”. Samurais and ronins, criminals of all sorts, ninja clans, Chinese pirates, Portuguese mercenaries and firearms traders, all trying to benefit from anarchy and conflict. It is hard to find a more atmospheric and dense setting for a tactical board war games.
recentChanges: - Exit application button added to setting menu
- Units and cards lists controls updated
- Warning windows added, you'll see them during an update process
- Replays issues fixed, now you can save your skirmishes for other players to watch
- Diagnostic tools added to game launch and skirmish loading processes
- Fixed issue with endless "Counting Battle Results.." screen
- Tutorial Quests hints now fit your screen
- Scale ratios fixed for some windows
summary: Turn-based historical hex CCG wargame, with samurai and ninja skirmish fights.
title: Warbands: Bushido - Tactical Miniatures Board Game

description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)

This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.

Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.

descriptionHTML:
Baby Animal Hair Salon 2 now with even more cuteness and hair styling fun! New animals, new hairstyles and new fashion adventures inside!

Play with 9 super cute jungle animals and choose who to style first - baby and mommy panda, baby and mommy bear, baby and mommy giraffe, baby and mommy leopard or baby kitten!
Wash, shampoo, rinse, dry, cut, curl, comb, dye, shave and trim animal hair and fur. Do manicure and makeup. Visit sloth's fashion dress up salon and design tons of crazy cool outfits for each jungle animal. Color your favorite animals, collect trophies and watch videos for kids in the best animal hair salon!

Baby Animal Hair Salon 2 games for kids and toddlers:
· NEW! Chubby baby panda is so messy - change the diapers, shower her and do the cutest newborn animal haircut!
· NEW! Curl, dye and style her mommy panda's hair. Apply glitter eyeshadow for an amazing look!
· NEW! Wash away the paint from baby bear's fur and turn him into a charming little gentleman!
· NEW! Mommy bear is forever young, play hip hop makeover with her and design the coolest look!
