comments: i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

I think it is hard for few people to purchase it. I personally love thus game but cannot purchase it. I hope and request game house to remove those purchase things will be removed so that I can play easily and so as other people.
Love delicious Emily, Fabulous Angela and Hearts Medicine. I'll always buy them and I can't wait for the next game to come out.
description: Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? üë∂ üçºüçº WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's lifeüçº PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levelsüçº GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first handüçº DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related placesüçº HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, Fran√ßois and Allison, plus many othersüçº CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby roomüçº TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every dayüçº CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved onesWill you be there for Emily when she needs you most?Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. üé• üçù It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! üë∂Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ‚ù§Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:üåü Delicious - Emily's Message in a Bottle: https://goo.gl/PEyYzGüåü Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears: https://goo.gl/NlFYvfüåü Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat: https://goo.gl/VOLClpüåü Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal: https://goo.gl/pkAp5Jüåü Fabulous - Angela's High School Reunion: https://goo.gl/UmfsOCüåü Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever: https://goo.gl/czC8qoüåü Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets: https://goo.gl/u7TEijüåü Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911: https://goo.gl/XNV042üåü Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion: https://goo.gl/xQRE0y
descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/

Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:
🌟 Delicious - Emily's Message in a Bottle: https://goo.gl/PEyYzG
🌟 Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears: https://goo.gl/NlFYvf
🌟 Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat: https://goo.gl/VOLClp
🌟 Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal: https://goo.gl/pkAp5J
🌟 Fabulous - Angela's High School Reunion: https://goo.gl/UmfsOC
🌟 Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever: https://goo.gl/czC8qo

🌟 Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911: https://goo.gl/XNV042
🌟 Mary le Chef - Cooking Passion: https://goo.gl/xQRE0y
summary: Help Emily through the ups and downs of her pregnancy! üë∂ üçº
title: Delicious - Emily's Miracle of Life

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

This game really makes me aware of financial and risk perspective of business. Good job, hope more features can be made in the next update
description: Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning. The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible. The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way. However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame
descriptionHTML:
Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!

Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.

3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.

Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning.

The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.

Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible.

The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way.

However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame
developerAddress: Sofia 1000. 1, 6th September Street, First floor, Office 1, Bulgaria
summary: Imagine that you lead startup from seed funding to the multi-million enterprise.
title: Business Inc.

description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way. Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley systemin order to open path that leads to the doors.GREAT GAME FEATURES:- 30 Maps and continue update - Nice character fire boy is red boy- Nice character blue girl is water girl- Always support .All levels are updating frequently- Nice Soundtrack- Classic gameplay from web- Back to childhood
descriptionHTML:
Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?
Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?
Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players.
It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.
You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game.
Lead Red boy and Water girl to their doors in each level of the Crystal Temp Maze, collecting fire diamonds and ice diamonds along the way.
Red boy must avoid the water and Ice girl must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both.
Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley system
in order to open path that leads to the doors.

GREAT GAME FEATURES:
- 30 Maps and continue update
- Nice character fire boy is red boy
- Nice character blue girl is water girl
- Always support .All levels are updating frequently
- Nice Soundtrack
- Classic gameplay from web
- Back to childhood
summary: It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.
title: Redboy and Bluegirl in Light Temple Maze

descriptionHTML:
Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market!

----------------------------------------

Game Features

• Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can!

• Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond!

• Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!

• Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).

• Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!

• Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!

• Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!

• Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!

• Complete contract missions to earn rewards.

• Can you unlock all of the achievements?

----------------------------------------

Adverts and Permissions

• Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!

• Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!

• Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!

----------------------------------------

With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!

----------------------------------------

Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.

- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.
- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.
- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.
- Do not leave games playing overnight.

----------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.

- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.

- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.

- You must be aged 13+ to play.

summary: Tap your way to an earthy empire in Dirt Inc!
title: Dirt Inc.

descriptionHTML:
Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone?
Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house? Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!

Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party!

Features:
> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies!
> Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it’s a secret!
> Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she’ll repeat what you say!
> Dress up your puppy in the most adorable outfits & doggy accessories.
> Feed your puppy yummy snacks like steak, ice cream, & drumsticks!
> Care for your pet puppy when she’s sick. Take her to the doctor’s clinic!
> Bathe your puppy - give your pet a warm bubble bath!
> Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room!
